resp.text: Mrs. Brady I am so very sorry that you were unhappy with our in ability to get to you sooner. I apologize for that, but we were very busy when you were in the store. The engraver was already out front with a customer that arrived prior to you. When the engraver finished with the customer he was waiting on, he asked who was requesting him and you had already left. He was giving the prior customer the same attention that he was hoping to give you. We did have a shortage of staff today due to illness, I apologize. I am also sorry that you did not realize he was helping someone else, I am sure you would have understood had you realized such.  Congratulations on the arrival of your new granddaughter that is such a blessing! Again, I am sorry that our engraver could not get to you sooner. I am happy to talk with you by phone as I am hurt that you left feeling unappreciated, as that is never our desire! Please call 334-365-6552 and ask for Lynn.

name: Gisette Greene
text: While I love the ring my husband picked out, I have to say this was one of the most unpleasant experiences I’ve ever had in a retail environment. I usually don’t like to post negative reviews but after hearing from multiple people that they experienced the same from here I felt I should. I instantly felt uncomfortable when I walked in. My husband had purchased my ring and I brought it in to get resized. That was my first visit and it was okay. They said to give them at least 5 days but I should receive it back sooner. 2 days later and they called back! I was thrilled! I was surprised how quickly the turnaround was. I left but the ring was too snug. I brought it back and the entire time the young lady was assisting me she seemed like I was a nuisance. Very unpleasant and I just couldn’t wait to get the heck out of there. Again, they had a very quick turnaround and when I walked in not one word was said to me. I walked up and I almost spoke first but I wanted to see how long this would last. FIVE employees there and not one spoke a word to me. When I got up to the counter still nothing was said. She handed me my rings and finally asked how they fit. Thankfully they fit perfectly and I never have to set foot in there again. Absolutely horrible service.

resp.text: We work hard to make all feel welcome and to provide excellent service. I sounds like we failed you and I am sorry! I do hope you will give us an opportunity to help you in the future. This will give us an opportunity to review all procedures. If you would like to speak to me in person, please come by or call 334-365-6552.

text: Fantastic customer service. Do yourself a favor and visit!!!!!

name: Andrea Williams
text: I called this morning,  then decided to go in to have some engravings done. Everyone was so nice, helpful, as well as professional! I needed the engravings in connection to a birthday gift, and needed it done extremely last minute! I called several other places beforehand and was pretty much told by everyone that it was impossible to get done in the timeframe for which I needed it, and I even offered to pay a fee in order to have it rushed. The person I spoke with said that not only could they get it done within my timeframe, but also they would not charge me a fee for doing so. I thought it would take at least a day and a half, but Justin got it taken care of in just a couple hours for me. I really loved his work, and the pieces looked beautiful! I was really made to feel like I was an important customer,  and that my business was truly appreciated. I was very impressed by the pregnant lady as well as Justin, and I will definitely be recommending Brian jewelry in the future. Additionally, it will be my go to store for jewelry purchases and needs from here on out.

resp.text: Andrea, we are so happy you felt welcome and appreciated in our store! That is our great desire. We are so pleased you allowed us to help you make your birthday celebration be enhanced by our services. Also thank you for giving Justin and Kendall a shout out. We hope to see you again soon!

resp.text: For over 63 years Bryan Jewelry has been one of the most trusted names in jewelry in the Prattville region. While we do buy Gold, we must inspect any and all products before we purchase them, upon looking at your product it was concluded that you had bullion. For your bullion we offered 75%, which was disclosed to you before the offer was made.  For any customer we will make an offer and it's up to the customer to make the decision to sell. All of our offers are fair and honest. It is with this policy coupled with our years of experience and services that have built a legacy of integrity and trust with our customers.

text: Excellent service and quality. I had ordered a signet ring for my daughter from another store and they totally messed up. name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Carol Roberts
text: Ware Jewelers is one of the few places locally you can take a Rolex for factory approved service. I believe they send the watches to their Auburn location and they are serviced there. They are also a Rolex retailer so you can buy the brand there. I have taken two rings to be sized but unfortunately they charge for sizing based on how many stones are in the ring and it gets really expensive for just a tiny adjustment. That said, I believe them to be a reliable and trustworthy jeweler.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words, Carol!  You are correct, our CW21 watchmaker in Auburn handles many of our Rolex repairs in house, although we always keep channels open to send watches directly to Rolex in the event that is determined to be necessary or a faster turnaround for you.

I absolutely understand your concern about how our sizing is priced, so I want to help you understand why we have to take the number of stones into account.  Whenever a jeweler sizes a ring, they then have to follow up on their work by checking each individual stone and tightening it, which can become very labor intensive when you are dealing with rings that have a large number of tightly spaced stones down the shoulder and onto the shank.  When it's all said and done, our objective is to make sure that when you get your ring back, you can wear it with full confidence that everything will remain where it belongs, from the ring on your finger down to the smallest stone on the shank.

Again, thank you so much, and I hope that helps clarify our policies a bit for you!

name: John Davis
text: I have exclusively shopped at the Eastchase Ware for all of my jewelry needs for the past 7 years. Their staff is very knowledgable and are always willing to take the time in order to assist me in finding the perfect gift. In fact, it is this personable approach that keeps me coming back. A typical "chain" jewelry store, they are not. The family owned atmosphere is proudly displayed as they are more concerned with what jewelry best fits my needs rather than what jewelry they want to sale. I guess that is really what makes Ware the place I want to shop...I am dealing with an individual who wants to assist me in my jewelry purchase as opposed to a sales person.

resp.text: Thank you very much, John!  It means everything to us to know that you've been treated so well, and have entrusted us with your loyalty as a result.  That's the sort of ethic that's kept us in business for the past 70 years, we always want to make sure that you are happy with every part of your experience when you come to visit us.

name: Leigh Quinney
text: Allison and Cheri have helped me refurbish family pieces, design custom pieces and choose new items over the years.  I would never trust anyone else to help make such special purchases and important decisions. Love them!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Leigh!  Allison and Cheri are both amazingly dedicated to their clients, and I'm glad you've had such a wonderful, long-standing relationship with them!

name: Andi Lee
text: My favorite local jewelry store. Everytime I'm in the store, I feel very welcome. Plus the service is good too. I bent my ring and I was so nervous that I would have to pay a lot to get it fixed. But I took it to them and it was barely 2 minutes before I had my ring back in excellent condition for free. It wasn't perfect, but it gave me peace of mind. He did warn me there would be a chance of it breaking, but luckily it didn't. And it wasn't even a ring from the store. I was so pleased.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Andi!  I'm glad we were able to help put your ring straight.  As you've discovered, we're always happy to take a look and see if we can help, regardless of whether your jewelry came from us or not.  There is very little we can't work on.

name: Mark Free
text: I would follow Cheri Jordan anywhere she goes.   She is the most knowledgeable in the market place......and always a joy to work with.   Ware Jewelers is lucky to have her........Customer Service is always tops at Ware

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mark!  I completely agree, Cheri is one of a kind and we are so lucky to have her as part of our family here!

name: Dancing Llamas
text: It was wonderful. Chris and and all the staff have been helpful and very polite. Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Fred!  We appreciate your feedback!

name: Raquel Anecito
text: Alexandra is an amazing sales person. She took care of all my needs. I recommend her next time you go.

resp.text: Thank you, Raquel!  Alexandra's one of the newest members of the Ware family, but she's settled in fast and we're expecting great things from her!

name: Cherie Dunn
text: I absolutely love the engagement ring my husband got at Wares. Thelma is wonderful and always remembers us when we go in the store!!

resp.text: Thank you, Cherie!  Thelma's in a league of her own when it comes to her memory for people.  I don't think I've ever seen her forget a face, and she's always using that talent to be mindful of what her customers want, as you've experienced first-hand!

name: Mary Anne Perkovich
text: Super friendly and knowledgeable staff! They are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure their customers are happy!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mary Anne!  We're always striving to make sure everyone who comes through our doors is treated like family!

name: Holly Butler
text: Great service! Had a ring sized and repaired. Beautiful work! Would recommend to everyone!  They really care about their customers!

name: Cristin JOSHUA
text: Wares jewelry stores provides more details to customers .Their products are of high quality value....I choose Wares as number one store.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Cristin!  We do pride ourselves on not just helping our customers find what they want, but also helping them to understand exactly what they're getting by explaining all the terms and ratings used in fine jewelry, and how that applies to their individual piece.

name: Angela Louviere
text:
While sharing time between my two sons and their activities this weekend, I made it a point to visit the store. My son will receive a Rolex watch for his upcoming college graduation. While he is very opinionated about the watch that he would like, I wanted to make sure that it wouldn’t be too big. Upon arriving, DeeDee greeted me with warmth and a friendly smile. She gladly showed me a Rolex to help me understand the sizing. My son met me a few minutes later.  He was very pleased to be able to try on a few watches and discuss the differences with DeeDee. He also told us that he didn’t think that he could try them on because earlier in the day, Thelma refused to show him and his dad any. I was very surprised to learn this since I had just encountered a great salesperson who was so helpful.
I didn’t even know that they had gone shopping! They were doing research too.
DeeDee has me considering a Rolex for myself (though I do love my Breitling!) and I will definitely want to work with her again.
Upon leaving, my son told me that Thelma wouldn’t even discuss the Deep Sea with them. She simply replied, ‘There’s a waiting list for those.’ He was very glad that he returned this evening and I’m so glad that he met me at the store and had a great experience instead of dismissing them all together. I hope to return soon and be able to purchase his watch (or maybe mine!!) and it will definitely be with DeeDee!

name: noel crenshaw
text: Alexander anecito is amazing I got everything taken care of that I needed to take care of for my wedding set

resp.text: Thank you, Noel!  Congratulations on your nuptials!

name: Katherine Reifenberg
text: My fiancé and I shopped with Ware Jewelers for my engagement ring and wedding band. Allison listened to exactly what we wanted and found the perfect band.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Katherine!  Allison really does have a gift for helping people find just what they're looking for.

name: c richert
text: Was very pleased with the patience and professionalism shown by DeeDee Johnson my Jewelry Consultant.  I did visit several jewelry stores before my purchase from Ware Jewelers in Montgomery, AL.  The service received was the main reason for my returning to Ware to buy my ring.

resp.text: Thank you very much!  We're very pleased to hear you had such a good experience working with DeeDee and that she's earned your confidence.  We'll strive to meet and exceed that expectation in the future.

name: Mike Johnson
text: Great brands on display and wonderful service.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike!

name: Matthew M
text: Amazing and very knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thank you, Matthew!

name: Jack English
text: Sarah Reid was very helpful and communicative.  My fiancé loves her ring. I would highly recommend Ware Jewlers in Spanish Fort along with Sarah!

resp.text: Jack, Thank you for your kind words.  We are a family owned business and your review is very much appreciated. Kind Regards, Ronnie Ware

name: Bailey Hall
text: I wish i knew about Ware Jewelers sooner!  My boyfriend purchased another David Yurman bracelet for me for Christmas, so I brought my older bracelets into have them cleaned. We have always ordered online but always ran into issues with their customer service. I will never order online again. All the girls as so accommodating and very knowledgeable! Overall amazing service and I will definitely be back for some more David Yurman!

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Laura T
text:
Having known of the store, and family while living in Auburn,  I was excited when we got our store here!
I have had nothing but excellent service, whether it's been a piece purchased from Ware's or not.
There is nothing like unwrapping a present to discover the gift underneath is in a green Ware's Jewelry box!

name: Laurie Jewell
text: I walked in and was greeted from the back of the store where an employee asked what she could help me with...I walked to the back where she stood behind the desk to ask if they could size a ring.  She immediately says they are not taking any outside sizing orders till after the new year.  She was very passive and not overly friendly.  As I was leaving I saw a case of David Yurman and asked her across the store if they carried any of the morganite...she never came over to the case and just stated they did not.  I was so put off by her service that I will not be back to ever make a purchase here.

name: Hey you
text: Visited this store to ask pricing on changing a watch battery and the cost for resizing it.  We were told they could not help us till after the new years which we found strange.  We received a pretty cold reception and they didn't seem to happy to see us.  Needless to say, as much as my husband and I love purchasing jewelry, we will not be returning to this store.

name: Matt Hudson
text: I recently purchased a watch and was assisted by an associate by the name of Meghan Hawkins.  Not only was she very informative, but she made the selection and purchase process very easy!  I recommend anyone in the market for jewelry and/or watches to stop by this location and see Meghan!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Matt!  We're glad you had such a good experience with Meghan.  She really puts her all into taking care of her customers!

name: seXy KNEEs
text: Fast, friendly, and efficient service. We love the ring!

resp.text: Thank you very much!

name: Hope Chandler
text: This is a complaint for the labs they use not the actual store itself... I sent my ring off a month ago to be resized and have my bands put together, it came back a week ago and there was a crack in my band so she sent it back off to another lab. Comes back in today and the ring looks like the lab didn’t even touch it still has the crack in it and all so she’s sending it back off again... these labs they use don’t do inspections before they send the jewelry back and they do poor jobs. We don’t spend thousands of dollars for our stuff to be treated like this.. The employees at the store in the mall are very helpful and understand my frustration and are just as mad as I am.

name: Lily Angelovich
text: Went in there tonight and nobody even said hello or even tried to help us. Don’t judge a book by it’s cover. I was going to pay cash for the jewelry but since they were too busy talking and not trying to even help I’ll take my business elsewhere.

name: Jonathan Hobbs
text: They love to sell the warranty but get an attitude when you need to use it.

name: Courtenay Nerbonne
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable staff.  Super friendly and not pushy.  Fantastic shopping experience

name: Regina Mayzum
text: Very nice and helpful staff

name: Ms Melody Rhines
text: Lisa is GREAT! Professional, efficient, friendly & informed, ready to help with ANY jewelry needs it your concerns, Busy KAY JEWELERS in the Wiregrass Commons Mall in Dothan, you'll enjoy your experience 😉

name: William Neal
text:
Refused service due to me not wearing a mask which I cannot medically wear one ...

I'll spend my money elsewhere in the future.

name: Shelia Hogans
text: Amber is the BEST! She is well knowledgeable of all the products and services! She always takes considerable care of my husbands and I wants and what we like!

name: Kevin Kennedy
text: I loved the service they gave me, they were very knowledgeable about the type of jewelry that I wanted. They suggested many types of pieces of jewelry that would be great for my lady. The sales Rep. Princess helped me with every little detail that I was looking for, she really knows what a Princess wants for she is princess herself just like her name. Thanks for all the help Princess.

name: Lanie Dixon
text: Terrible customer service!!! My fiancé and I went to Kay’s in Wiregrass Commons over the weekend to try on wedding bands to go with my ring. They were pretty busy, busier than they normally are when I’m at the mall, so we decided to go visit another store since we knew we wouldn’t be helped for a while. We came back about 30 minutes later and there were 2 customers in the store. We sat down and waited for them to be helped first. We sat in the store for an HOUR and not ONE employee acknowledged us, told us they would be right with us, apologized, nor thanked us for waiting. We kept being walked by like we were dust on the ground. One of the worst customer service experiences I have ever had. Do better!!! I seriously could not believe the experience we had.

name: Amelia Whitaker
text: The staff is friendly and knowledgeable.  They helped me with an item that needed work.  I have also been pleasantly pleased with the ring and earrings purchased from them.  Thank you Janet, and your staff.  Y'all are awesome!

name: Jerri O'Donohoe
text: Kay Jewelers treats us like Royals. Sophia and the staff at Pearland Town Center are fabulous! We highly recommend Kay's.

name: Kristen Galego
text: Just left Kay's in dothan thanks to kayla! Thank you kayla for making my dream come true. You went above and beyond for me everytime I look at my ring I'll be reminded of your amazing customer service <3.

name: Kamron Higgins
text: I had such a great seamless experience . They listened to my likes and dislikes and provided me with the perfect ring ! The sales lady Kailah was amazing , she took her time and gave me plenty of options to choose from . She even took the time to learn how me and my now fiance met . Thank you kay jewelers Dothan for everything!

name: Crystal Arnold
text: My husband, 2 kids and I went in last Friday to look for new bands for our vow renewal next month. We had the pleasure of Kailah, Svetlana and Kassie helping us pick our new rings. I tired on MANY and went back and forth...I was THAT customer and they were nothing but patient and didnt try to push a sale. They wanted to make sure I got exactly what I wanted. My girls started to get a bit restless after a couple HOURS and they got them something to keep them busy so my husband and I could shop. Thank you ladies for your kindess and we will be back!

name: Holley Hawkins
text: If I could give this place a negative 10 that's what I would do. We have had such awful experiences with this place!!! I have 2 rings from them. One that was sent off 3 times. And a brand new one that I haven't even had a year sent off 5 different times!! Cracked stones, loose stones, bad brackets. It's really awful quality and awful customer service. We have been lied to over and over. Nothing has been done. My ring was supposed to be replaced this 5th time it's been gone and they never sent it off or ordered the replacement and I've been waiting since May!!!! Here it is August!!! I call to see if it was in because it was supposed to be here July 26th. They said yes. I go in to get it and it's my original, BROKEN ring!!!!!!! We will NEVER use Kay's again!!!!!!! The assistant manager Tara should be fired!!! She is AWFUL with customers and a liar!!! She was the one supposedly handling this!!!!!!

name: J j
text: The nicest and most professional Jewelry store I've experienced In awhile!! props to Tara and Janet for their outstanding customer service!!

name: Kimberly Carter
text: The worst customer service for a jewelry store I have ver seen, I had to send in my ring due to I believe a flaw for replacement.  I called on multiple occasions to find out about my ring and have yet to find out any information, very rude staff. This isn't the first time I have recieved a rude staff memeber either, I called to find out about a matching band and was given very rude customer service. I believe this will be the end of me buying from Kay.

name: Jeni Tart
text: Two people working, both with customers, stood there for over 20 minutes. Neither even acknowledge that we were standing there. No be right with you, no nothing. Rude rude rude. Won't have my business ever again.

name: Akilah Howard-Brown
text: Great and Friendly service

name: Deshanda Gardner
text: The worst customer service ever will not be back.

text: I just want to take a moment to praise the helpful and good hearted women at this boutique. There is a reason Ruby Blue has been around for years. Service. Prices. Selection, all fantastic. No other shop in Mobile has as much of a selection all at fair prices. good experience all around. will continue to shop

resp.text: Thank you, Scott! It's always a pleasure working with your family.

name: Michael Jones
text: Purchased my Mom’s Christmas gift here with photos they shared it’s me and when I picked it up they brought it out to my car. She absolutely loved the earrings! The nicest people.

name: Jessica Jones
text: My engagement ring was purchased from a different source, and I did not like the band that it was on; it was too thin. I brought the ring into Jamie Hood Jewelers to have the stone placed on a much thicker band with thicker prongs. I love it! They did such a beautiful job!

name: Ryan Earwood
text: I was truly impressed by the level of customer service. They have a large selection of jewelry and have no problem answering each question that you may have. I had both my kids in the store and not only did they provide me excellent customer service, but was also able to answer all 6000 questions my six year old had. Thank you for all of the help and I will definitely be back.

name: Tara Cooper Ledlow
text: JHJ has the best customer service ever!  Not only did they help me find the perfect ring but then they customized it to the ring of my dreams!!!!  Thank you Justin and Lydia!

name: Deb Kirby
text: Jamie Hood Jewelers is the one and only place to purchase treasures of all sizes and shapes. Plus the professional help you'll receive while finding your treasure is impeccable!

name: Kayla Lowery-Busick
text: Lydia and Jonathan are wonderful. I've always been very happy with the service I have received there. I find myself going there again and again for gifts for every occasion. The quality is wonderful, the selection great,  and the customer care is unparalleled. ❤❤

name: Mandi Jackson
text: Great, kind, down to Earth people. Being from Lawrence County, friends & family would always go to the shoals to do business with Jamie Hood Jewelers. So glad to have a Decatur store close to home too! Shop with them for all your needs! You won't be sorry!

name: Kelli Peck
text: The best customer service! They get to know you and are happy to help you find the perfect piece for any occasion. They went over and beyond for us - making the purchase of our wedding sets a breeze.

name: Sheila Glasgow
text: Jamie Hood in Muscle Shoals remade my original wedding ring for my 35th anniversary.  It's a one of a kind and absolutely beautiful!!!  Everyone that sees it always tells me how beautiful it is and asks where it came from.

name: Miranda Barnes
text: Love this jewelry store. They have a wonderful staff. We are looking for a blue sapphire engagement ring.  I would recommend this location to anyone looking for that special piece of jewelry.

name: Betsy Cameron
text: Jamie Hood Jewelers of Decatur designed my engagement and wedding rings. I gave them the diamonds and garnet and the rest is history. They did a fantastic job on bith rings, I was more than satisfied. I still get compliments 4 years later.

name: Luke Brackin
text: Helped me find the perfect engagement ring. Great prices and incredible customer service!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Luke! We wish you all the best!

name: autumn Garrie
text: Jamie Hood Jewelers are amazing!!! We got my step mom a mother’s ring for Valentine’s Day and they helped us create the perfect ring for the occasion!! I always love the beautiful and pieces they make!! Thank Jamie Hood Jewelers!!

name: ERNEST FERGUSON
text: My wife went into their store.  She found a pair of earrings she loved.  They placed them on a wish list.  I was able to come back later without her knowing and easily purchases the item she wanted.  Save me time!!!!!  Awesome customer servce

name: Steve Harris
text: I took my Citizen Eco Drive watch in to have the crystal replaced.  Estimated time was 2 Weeks.  After multiple trips and 5 weeks later my watch was ready.  After a few days, I noticed that the date would no longer change.  I took it back and was told that it was not their fault and it was not damaged during the repair...Hmmmm It was fine when I took it in, they took it all apart to repair it, and it didn't work correctly when I got it back.  And they said not their fault?

name: Anneliese Shelton
text: The people who work here are very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: Katie Alexander
text: Beautiful store with stunning jewelry!!! If you are looking for something special this is the place to go. Amazing all around with wonderful service!

name: Ethan Murphy
text: I recently had some work done on a ring by Jamie Hood Jewelers in Decatur. Can’t say enough about the experience! Great service and people! Keep up the great work!

text: The employee’s are all very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. I didn’t feel pressured or rushed while shopping. They have a large selection to choose from and I think their prices are great.

Jamie and talented staff are the best in Alabama! Jamie is a Graduate Gemologist and not only understands the needs & desires of his clients his is also a Master Benchman(crafts jeweler & hands on repairs watches & jewelery!
As far as I'm concerned there is no better Jeweler in all of Alabama. Tell him Ranger Steve & his Service Dog, says Hi!

text: Wonderful jewelers. Very efficient in repairing a ring I purchased from Ware Jewelers several years earlier. Excellent service. Would highly recommend. My husband and I have been going to Ware’s since 1975. We now live out of state, but continue to purchase our jewelry from there.

name: Dan Cocks
text: Mine was a simple request to replace a watch battery. Because it is considered a “premium” watch, a jeweler that sells that brand tried to charge me $100 for “lifetime battery replacement”. I walked out of there and came here the next time I came back to Auburn. This was exactly as you would hope and expect of a Jewry store. They were polite, pleasant, helpful, and fair in their pricing. Why bother to write a review for a battery replacement?  Because I have come to appreciate that not all jewelers are the same.

name: Joann Hill
text:
Love Ware Jewelers! They are the best...Jo at Tigertown store is excellent and goes all out to help you find exactly what you want. She also keeps in touch after the purchase to make sure all is well!
Very pleasant experience...every time!!

name: Deirdre Gunn
text: Ware Jewelers has been my most trusted jewelers since I was in school at Auburn in 1983! If I need work done, or appraisals, I wouldn’t dream of going anywhere else. They are always courteous and kind, and very professional, and I know I can depend on their honesty as well.

name: Catherine Bower
text: My wedding and engagement ring are both from Wares. I had so much fun picking them out. Bailey is absolutely wonderful to work with!

They did a fabulous job of helping me designing it and when it was completed it was more than I hoped for. I absolutely love it and have gotten so many compliments on it. Will you Ware Jewelers for all my jewelry needs.

name: Terri McCard
text: Fast and affordable local service!

name: Michael Watson
text: Always receive prompt, outstanding service. Lindsay and Jennifer are especially attentive to their customers.

My ring turned out nice & they cleaned it beautifully. I would definitely recommend this jewelry store. I will be returning for any Jewelry purchases & or jewelry repair.

name: Louellen Stoner
text: I needed a battery for my watch and when I took it in they were very friendly and attended to me very quickly. I left the watch with them and they called me when it was ready for pickup. When I went to pick it up, they went beyond just replacing the battery, they cleaned and polished the watch itself. I was very satisfied with all they did and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Maureen Montgomery
text: Awesome staff and easy to work with, we will be back!

name: Darby Winkler
text: I had the best experience at Ware. The staff was so welcoming and kind. We worked with Jo and she really took the time to get to know us and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. I would recommend Ware to anyone!

name: Debora Nichols
text: The staff is always friendly, courteous and helpful. All services have been rendered professionally and items are ready by scheduled pick up date.

name: Ray Smith
text: Always a pleasure, friendly courteous service

name: TJ Fuqua
text: Always a huge help when I come in!  Very knowledgeable and accommodating.  These ladies make what can be an intimidating experience easy for you.  I highly recommend them!

name: Madelyn Candler
text: My sister and I brought in several pieces of pearl jewelry that had belonged to our mother. We wanted to repurpose the pieces into pieces that we thought would appeal to my daughters and my sister’s daughter-in-law. Emily met with us and listened to all we had to say about the styles we were looking for. Together we came up with designs that we thought each of the girls would like. When we went to pick them up, she had not made the final piece. After looking at all the others she felt that the design of the design of last piece was not comparable to the others and she feared we would not be satisfied. She had a new design drawn up for us to consider.  She was absolutely right; the original design needed the changes she made. We appreciate that she cared enough to wait on that last piece. As it turned out, that design became my favorite. Emily truly created beautiful pieces that we feel reflect the personalities of each girl.  There is no way our experience could not have been improved upon.

name: Daphne Davis
text: Took two weeks longer that promised to restring necklace.

name: Bertha Cade Clark
text: My watch needed a battery and when it was ready I received a call. Thank you Ware Jewelers.

name: John Guisinger
text: I went there to get a sterling silver chain for my Saint Christopher necklace. They ordered me a chain in the length that I wanted and when it came in they attached the medallion to it. They even polished it up to where it looked better than it ever has. All of the women that work there are very friendly and helpful. I'll definitely go back again for all of my jewelry needs. I highly recommend them!

name: Christina Mitchell
text: I walked into this store with my daughter looking for a certain item. The line is no longer carried, but I was directed to other items that were perfect for what I was looking for. I asked my daughter if that was what she wanted Santa to bring and the kind lady kept it going. When the item arrived in the store, she called and said Santa delivered an item. I was impressed she remembered after all the people she’s helped during that week. She was not available when I arrived at the store, but everyone was extremely friendly and helpful while I was in the store. I ended up buying another item while I was there and I left completely satisfied with the service I received. I would definitely recommend this store to others for the spectacular customer service.

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. They are very much appreciated especially during this time. Please contact us if we can do anything for you.

name: April Aker
text: Ware Jewelers is quite possibly the best! Every one is friendly and helpful.  They remember their customers by name! That is important to me. This is why I shop only at Ware Jewelers!

name: Maggie Webb
text: My husband bought my rings from Ware's from Jennifer Chastain. Everyone there is amazing. We have talked to several people who have all been so helpful. One of my diamonds fell out of my band, and I was devastated. When I went in, they were very comforting and fixed it for free! I was going on a vacation the next week, and they gave me a ring to wear while I was on vacation. I will not buy jewelry from anywhere else because Ware's will take care of you.

name: Cynthia Ford
text: ALL the employees are so very nice and helpful. I bought several gifts there last week and Lindsey helped me find exactly what I wanted. Even had to make an exchange a few days later, and Lindsey didn’t seem to be bothered by it at all. I really did feel like I was the most important customer in the store.

name: Louis Clough
text: I’ve had the wonderful experience working with Ware Jewelers. Their staff is always eager to help in anyway possible. A top notch jeweler.

name: Richard Loftis
text: Very well run with great salespersons truly anxious to assist one with a smile. Wouldn’t shop anywhere else!

name: Colleen Mccann
text: Jo and all of the staff at Ware Jewelers in the Tiger Town location are so sweet! They clean my jewelry while I was there and have an amazing selection of fine jewelry and gifts.

name: Kay McClain
text: What an amazing store with amazing service. I cannot say enough about the service. They have a wonderful selection of jewelry, china, and gifts. However, if you can't locate what you need that is not very helpful. The folks that work there are so familiar with the inventory that you can just describe something and they appear with it. They remember their clients and send emails when items arrive that might be of interest. I have gotten reminders of sales and the items on sale that would interest me. They have special ordered pieces of jewelry for me to my delight. Their watch repairs service is also excellent. If I need a gift, I can find something there! It is far more than a jewelry store. I can't say enough about all the services available and the helpful staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Kay!  We really do try to go the extra mile, and it's wonderful to know how appreciated that is.

name: John Dennett
text: Outstanding service with a pleasant and professional staff!

name: Rootietoot Toot
text: They were very helpful. I had some rings resized and they did a perfect job, even cleaned and polished them!

name: Owen Smith
text: Wares Jewelry cares about their customers.  Not only are they professional, they are prompt and efficient.  Their many years of serving the Lee County area is proof of their continued commitment of satisfaction.

name: Jerry Robison
text: Quick and excellent service on my watch.  Looks like new again.  Very friendly staff.

name: David Whitten
text: It has been my experience that whatever in the line of jewelry I want or need, Ware Jewelers is the place to go.  I have lived and worked in Auburn for fifty years and one of the first people I met when moving here in 1968 was Lamar Ware.  He was a man of character who established his business to reflect his high standards.  Lamar is gone but his family maintains the high standards that he put into place years ago.  I am leaving Alabama and regret leaving behind a firm that I could always depend on.

resp.text:
David,
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated!  We are always just a phone call or email away !  Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Clint Taylor
text:
My wife and I bought our wedding rings there in 1977 and have enjoyed doing business with them over the years. A wonderful hometown company.
Clint Taylor

name: Pludie Buckley
text: They are very friendly and very helpful,but I went in to have a coin engraved and they didn't engrave it. They glued an engagement on the coin. My husband was disappointed because he was afraid it would eventually come off.

resp.text:
Pludie,
Good Morning! We do not show a transaction under your name. We can engrave coins. Please call Ronnie Ware at Ware Jewelers in Auburn Alabama 334-821-7375

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring and it fell out. The list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! Also, If you get your pearls restrung there, they take them out of the store and they go to “Jo’s home, “ which is just totally unprofessional on every level.

name: Rebecca Palmer
text:
The lovely ladies at the Tiger Town location took great care of my repair job. I needed to have a ring sized correctly after a previous Jeweler had botched the job. It took me 3 months at the other place to get my ring back and it was wrong, but it only took me 3 days to get the correct size at Ware. Their Jeweler is awesome, and their staff is stellar.
UPDATE: once again the lady jeweler at Tiger Town location saves the day by sizing up my granddaughter's new ring in record fast time. Thanks Ms. Robin, it looks beautiful.

name: Cody B Van Houten
text: I have been shopping at Ware Jewelers all my life. As have my parents, and grandparents did. I trust no one else with my jewelry needs. Whether it be purchasing new pieces or servicing prior purchases, or maintaining my families jewelry. I trust no one else.

name: Ouida Webb
text:
Happiness is a gift box from Ware Jewelers!! Sometimes, the smallest boxes have the best surprises!!
Seriously, I love shopping at Wares. The stores are beautiful and so is their inventory. Customer service has always been awesome, regardless of whether I'm just browsing to ooh and ahh or shopping with a purpose! I enjoy every unique piece of jewelry I've purchased as well as items for my home. It is always easy to find a gift for someone, and my daughters get just as excited as I do when receiving a box wrapped in Ware's gift wrap!  I've shopped at Ware Jewelers for almost 40 years and look forward to 40 more!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ouida!  We love hearing about families that come to us across entire generations.  It really helps remind us of our own family ties, and how deep our roots are in the community!

name: Stephanie Randall
text: Repaired my rings so beautifully  they look brand new! Friendly staff and excellent customer service! Would recommend  to everyone!

name: Patti G. Reaves
text:
Went in the Tiger Town location to have a battery replaced in my watch. The young lady, Maddie, that helped me was very kind and courteous.
The reason for only 3 stars....it took a week for them to replace the battery.

name: Allen Lott
text:
Wife lost ear ring. Called Jo and explained situation. Birthday was in 10 days and I wanted a setting and diamond to match.
They came through and thier in house jeweler
Did a great job.

name: Sara Lee
text: Great workmanship on soldering my rings together and wonderful customer service!

name: Evelyn Mickle
text: Very helpful  staff,  good evaluation, price for repair reasonable,  quick service great work  very happy. With results

name: Tiffany Cole
text:
I had to have a set of pearls restrung for a second time.  The service was fabulous and she worked to find a way that would not cost me as much as it did the first time but will also provide greater strength in hopes of not breaking again.

The employees were friendly and professional!

name: Courtney Dios
text: Provided exceptional help with finding the perfect wedding ring and band for my husband. They were patient and willing to work with you until you found the perfect setting and diamonds. Would highly recommend their services as they were the best around Auburn hands down.

resp.text: Thank you, Courtney!  That's exactly the experience we hope people have when they come to see us, regardless of what they're looking for (but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a bit sentimental about engagement rings and wedding bands).

name: Rhonda Beadles
text: I had my watch band adjusted. Ware Jewelers is always my go to jewelry store. While I was there I found a gift for my first grandchild coming in December. They wrapped it beautifully for no extra charge. I love shopping there!!

name: JULIAN WHITTEN
text: Jennifer Chastain was most helpful and a pleasure to work with.

name: Patricia Frazier
text: The staff was friendly and very professional when I was looking for diamond earrings for my daughters birthday. She absolutely loves them and I will definitely visit this location and staff again for my jewelry needs.

name: Brooke Perkins
text: Always had great experiences working with Ware Jewelers. This is a great honorable company and has wonderful employees. Jo and Robin at the Tigertown location are the ladies I do most of me business with, but everyone there is pleasant and ready to help you with all your jewelry needs. Go see them. You will NOT be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you, Brooke!  Jo and Robin really do head up an amazing store over at Tiger Town, and it's always good to know people are having wonderful experiences working with them day in and day out!

name: Linda Jordan
text: Well pleased with the work done on my Rolex.Thank you!

name: Stephanie Wilbanks
text: This place is awesome. They were so helpful and patient with me when I changed my mind 200 times. They finally found me the perfect ring! I couldn't be happier!

name: Judy Miller
text: Robin was so helpful and offered suggestions without being pushy. She repaired my engagement ring and had it ready to pick up in one day! Thanks to her expert cleaning, my rings look new and my diamond is sparkling!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judy!  We're very lucky to have Robin here with us, and are thrilled to hear she took such good care of you!

name: Rodney Moore
text: Overall experience was pleasant. Robin helped with a bracelet purchase and provided her usual excellent service. Those who assisted with paperwork and pickup were cheerful and a pleasure to interact with.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Rodney!  We count ourselves very lucky to have Robin with us, and we're glad to hear she and the rest of the staff take such good care of you.

name: Cheryl Stevenson
text: The Jewelers were extremely professional, helpful, and provided a quality product with which I am completely satisfied!

name: Steve Lock
text: Wares is always wonderful to work with!!  Friendly, professional staff!!  Very knowledgeable!!  Would recommend to everyone!!

name: Erik Van Slyke
text: The custom pendant made by Emily was gorgeous!  And the staff was always warm, welcoming and very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. Very much appreciated.

name: K P
text: My engagement ring is amazing! They helped my husband so much with choosing a diamond and creating my ring. The quality at Ware's is so much better than other stores and I would never trust my jewelery to anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you Katie!  We're thrilled that you love your ring so much!

name: Taylor Swann
text: Ware Jewelers has always been my family's jewelers since before I was born! I have always received the best customer service each time I shop, and always end up with such beautiful jewelry! I highly recommend Ware Jewelers!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Taylor!  It is always humbling to be reminded of how many people have been shopping with us across entire generations of their families.  Thank you for letting us be there for you!

name: Gita Smith
text:
I look for two things when I shop for jewelry, and Ware Jewelers has them both.
The first is top quality merchandise because it is important to know that craftsmanship and materials will last a lifetime.
The second is a personal relationship with the store staff. They understand my tastes and they do not try to push me towards something just for the sake of a quick sale. If I visit Ware, I might ask to see three or four pieces and buy nothing at the moment. Nevertheless, they are always gracious.
Gita Smith

resp.text: Thank you, Gita.  We strive to carry the finest brands for our customers, but I think you really hit it on the head with your assessment of the relationships we strive to build.  We believe that our job isn't done right unless you're happy; it's always about much more than just a sale.

name: Jeannie Railey
text: Jo Harper helped us threw the process of my wedding band...We liked our service so much we purchased a crystal canister for our sand ceremony and our cake plate from wares .. She went above and beyond to make sure we were happy..She was at the one Auburn offices at the time..I'd use wares again if I ever wanted to purchase jewelry..

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jeannie!  Jo has been such an amazing credit to the Ware family, we're lucky to have her and so pleased she took such good care of you!

name: J D HARRIS
text: Great service and sales. No pressure to purchase.

name: Quentin Padgett
text: Excellent service and product knowledge. Staff is always friendly. Best manager ever!

name: Richard Prather
text: Lindsey always remembers me by name and is very helpful and courteous!  Couldn't ask for better customer service which is very refreshing when it's virtually non-existent in today's retail market!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Richard!  It's always our goal to make sure that your needs are foremost in our considerations.

name: Lucas Kerby
text: Joe is extremely knowledgeable about all products Wares offers. She is an amazing representative for Wares. I will be shopping here again.

resp.text: Thank you, Lucas!  Jo really is amazing, and we're lucky to have her!

name: Susan Hughley
text: Ward's Jewelers is the best place to shop for all your wedding gifts and jewelry.  I MET JOE AT the Village Mall...and she is still the Best!!!!!.the customer service is out standing.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susan!  Jo really is great, and we're glad she's been taking such good care of you!

name: Renee Folk
text: Love this store and one of managers Jo has been the most helpful. We will continue to buy Pandora,Auburn jewelry and other great gifts Love,Love,Love❤️❤️❤️

name: Jerry Rayfield
text: Fantastic every time i have been in there. Friendly,  knowledgeable staff.  Excellent quality!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jerry!  We appreciate the vote of confidence!

name: Jeannette Calderon
text: Good service. Excellent staff.

name: Miste Vickers
text: Jo always has such a bubbly, cheerful  attitude. We have had the pleasure of shopping with her for over 10 years. She is the reason we always shop with Wares. She always goes above and beyond to fit our needs.

resp.text: Thank you Miste!  Jo's a really amazing person, and we're so glad you've made that connection with her.

name: Heather Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice and easy to work with. Jennifer did a great job helping us select the perfect rings for our wedding!

name: Jamie Bradfield
text:
Ariel spent about 30-40 minutes with me while I decided on a 25 year anniversary ring.  It was important to me and she showed the same enthusiasm in selecting the right ring to mark this significant anniversary.  The whole staff showed sincere interest in my choice.  It was reassuring to know I made the correct decision with their input.

Jamie Bradfield
LaGrange, GA

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jamie!  25 years is something to celebrate, and we're glad Ariel and the rest of our Tiger Town staff could help you bring your own plans to fruition.  Congratulations!

name: Jackie Young
text: Excellent customer service from door being opened when entered and greeted and leaving a charm for engraving on a Friday and it being ready on Monday already!!! Well done.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Jackie!  We're glad we were able to get that back to you so quickly!

name: Charles Mickle
text: Great service, quick turnaround on my watch repair

name: Tiffany Trueblood-Adkins
text: Wonderful items, professional, knowledgeable  and friendly staff. When making a jewelry purchase, this is the service you want and deserve.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Tiffany!  We'll do our best to keep living up to expectations!

name: Carla Blatt
text: Very nice and helpful employees.  Turn around is extremely quick.

name: Summer Galloway
text: The staff is always polite and friendly and they do great repair work.

name: Wally Armstrong
text: Very courteous and helpful, and outstanding service. Would highly recommend and will definitely use again.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words, Wally!  We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to work with you.

name: Chad Finnegan
text: Great team, quality and follow up. Will purchase from here again.

name: Trisha Mobley
text: Great jewelry store where customer service and satisfaction is very important.

name: Maureen Heney
text:
Lindsey at Wares jewelers ag
TigerTown is a great
Salesperson .she has gotten to know what I like and suggests things to me. She is not pushy and always willing to hold something for me
For a
Couple days. I also have had repairs done there which have turned out great. Very happy with tiger town wares and especially Lindsey Turner. I wish they carried David Yurman and Lagos but I love their selection of John Hardy jewelry.
Maureen

resp.text: Thank you, Maureen!  We're so glad you've had such good experiences with Lindsey!

name: Georgia Dennett
text: Great service. I got exactly what I was looking for!

name: Lenore Bacek
text: Very professionally written appraisal.

name: Kristin Nelson
text: They are always so friendly and helpful.  Also, they have the best selections!

resp.text: Thank you, Kristin!

name: Marcia Wamble
text: More than satisfied with my recent experience of purchasing a gift item at Wares in Tiger Town.

resp.text: Thank you, Marcia!  We're always happy to help!

name: Brandon Culpepper
text: Very helpful and quick but done right and Joe is a great sales representative

resp.text: Thank you very much, Brandon!  We value the time you choose to spend with us and always want to make sure you get the most out of it.

name: Susan Boes
text: I have a good experience as Kiera is always friendly and helpful with my needs. She is patient and listens wel..

resp.text: Thank you, Susan!  We're very glad Kiera has been taking such good care of you.

name: Jeni Elliott
text: Ware's always has the best gifts, and the entire staff is always so knowledgeable, sweet, and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you, Jeni!  We're always happy to be of service.

name: Karen H
text: Robin and Jo took great care of my daughters and I. Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Karen!  It's always good to hear positive feedback about our Tiger Town team!

name: Mary Meadows
text: The manager, Jo, provided excellent service!

name: Lessie McCreless
text: The associates are very welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Lessie!  We appreciate the kind words.

name: kelly creech
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff and beautiful merchandise.

resp.text: Thank you, Kelly!

name: Jesse Creech
text: Staff was extremely friendly, patient and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse!  That's our goal with everyone who comes through our doors.  It's good to know we hit the mark!

name: Terrell Barrington
text: Guys if you need something for that special lady in your life go see Jo and she will hook you up with a gift that keeps on giving!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Terrell!

name: martha donald
text: They done a great job

resp.text: Thank you, Martha!

name: Amy Hutto
text: Friendly and loving staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Amy!

name: Kevin Broach
text: Loved everything about it!!! Go see Jo!!

resp.text: Thank you, Kevin!

name: Marie Yelvington
text: Wonderful service!

resp.text: Thank you, Marie!

name: Steve Brown
text: Was looking to trade in a old ring I had purchased from Kay to bring down the cost. Found the ring I wanted in the store and decided to think about it. After leaving checked Kay's website and found the same ring for the same cost without trading in my ring. First thing came to mind was "You Croaks". I almost gave you "CROAKS" my ring for nothing. BUYERS BEWARE THIS IS WHAT IT HAS COME TO.

name: Deanna Salazar
text: My husband wanting to surprise me for Christmas this year 2020 and doing so we went to Kay in Decatur on the 24th of December. We got there and he purchase me a beautiful ring-! The young lady Jasmine was working and was helping us to decide and making this the best experience ever-! With the holidays here Jasmine told us it would take about 2 plus weeks for it to be returned. I went into the storr tonight just to see if my ring was back and to my surprise it was-! With the holidays and everything it did take the 2 weeks-! Jasmine and the other young lady that night (Diana) was wonderful-! Jasmine tonight was wonderfule-! I recommend them to anyone-! Thanks again Jasmine

name: Sarah Blakely
text: I went to Google to get the store's number and saw the last 2 reviews and had to say something! We will be calling corporate as well! We NEVER go to the Decatur location, because of past experiences,  but recently we had a wedding to attend in town and stopped in. Jessica, the store Manager, was INCREDIBLE.  I had dreaded walking in and she immediately made us feel at home. The reason I am leaving a review is because not only was the man claiming a dispute with his credit company in there and behaving like an absolute juvenile, I fully believe the call she received from who I gathered (from eavesdropping tbh) was corporate was in regards to the man on here complaining about "an order." First of all, I am a retail manager as well. If I gave a return on a machine we sent somewhere for maintenance I would lose my job.  The man acted like a baby, and my husband was irate that a grown man should behave that way. The manager, though, was nothing less than professional,  and dealt with it better than I would have for sure! Secondly,  when I listened to her phone conversation about pendant man,  Jessica said more than once but shouldn't we do something for him, they hadn't found out if they could yet (or something like that.) All I thought that day was wow, people are so rude, and it's not even their fault. I never thought I would recommend the Decatur store, but 100% I recommend to everyone! The staff is nice, I actually trust them for once, and the manager Jessica is clearly willing to go above and beyond to try to help you even when you act like a total jerk to her. I admit even I kinda did at first, I just expected the kind of service that caused us to stop going there. Jessica if you see this, you have customers for life - The Blakely Family

name: corey house
text: Dishonest, no Integrity, and their word means nothing. Bought diamond earrings from Decatur, Al store and thought ordered custom diamond picture pendant to match earrings. After several assurances the piece could be made kay finally told me the piece couldn't be made but would not take earrings back because 30 day window passed for refund but it passed because I was waiting on pendant to be made. I did inform kay in beginning that I was getting earrings and pendant as set. They finally told me custom order was never put in is the reason for no refund which wasnt my fault. I don't work for kay and I don't know the protocol  but the store manager took my order or at least I thought and once they couldn't deliver they used a technicality to keep my money. They dont have the best merchandise anyway but make sure you cross your t's and dot your i's when dealing with them.

name: Chasity Warren
text: I had went to two different jewelers to order my daughter a class ring and no one seemed to care to help, just told to go online. I did not know her size and she was with me but no one seemed to want to help. Walked into Kay jewelers on 6th ave and it was totally different. They were super friendly and there’s was also online but she pulled it up and ordered it with me there and sized my daughter. We received it today and went in to pick up and love it and also the same friendliness. Thank you for being good at what you do!

name: Amanda Lambert
text: Me and my husband were at Kay Jewelers tonight. The gentleman that helped us was very pleasant. We had a great experience picking out my valentine’s present.

name: Paul Eichwurtzle
text: Friendly, thorough, professional service. Reasonable pricing.

name: Midnight_Rider 2020
text: Good and pretty jewelry

name: Jo Dumas
text: Bought a pocket watch for my son in law for his graduation from the police academy. Took it back there 2 times to have it engraved. They couldn't find the engraving paperwork both times. Thought since I purchased it there it wouldn't be a problem to have it engraved.Will be taking it somewhere else. Very unprofessional staff.

name: Ashlie Richie
text: I took my husbands wedding ring in to be sized and they told us to come back in two weeks to pick it up. When we got there to get his ring they couldn’t find it and asked us if we were sure it was this store that we used. Then they finally found it and the bag it was in had giant red writing on it that said “Have Not Paid”. I explained to the lady that when I bought the ring I also bought the warranty and that when they found us in the system two weeks prior that they said because I bought that we would not have to pay for it to be sized. She looked us up in the system and could not find us again. When we came in the first time they had trouble finding me in the system and the same lady took all my information and said she would update me in the computer so we would not have to go through all of that again. When I explained that, she laughed and said “Oh that was me haha I didn’t do it.” So they spend like 20 minutes just trying to find us in the computer and then acted like they didn’t want to give us our ring once they found us. We found out after we left that after all of that they did not even size it!! We definitely will NOT be coming back here.

name: Michael R
text: Gary, the manager, assured me my ring would be in the month before my wedding, and told me if he was ever out of the store his co-manager Cristy would take care of me. Nobody followed up with me regarding the ring or informed me they would not have it by the date we needed it. A week before the wedding date I called up to the store and was told Gary was out of town so I left my name and number and asked to have Cristy call me. No response. Two days later I called and again asked for Cristy by name. The girl came back to the phone and said Cristy did not call me back because Gary knew about my account, not her. She didn't take my call. We did not have a ring on the wedding date, we couldn't even talk to anybody who knew the status. I finally received the ring, well past the wedding date, about twice as long as Gary told me it would take. Gary repeatedly blamed the shop for not having or knowing about my ring. When I picked up the ring I told Gary they dropped the ball and I felt like they should adjust the price of the ring - or do something to make it right. Gary looked me in the eyes and told me "I will go to bat for you" in regards to making it right, he said he would contact me in a few days. After a month I called Gary back today to ask for his district managers number, in hopes of finally getting a resolution. Gary said to me, "I thought we were done when you picked up your ring". A far cry from going to bat for me like he said he would. I feel like Gary intentionally lied to me to get rid of me. I closed my account and wont do business with Kay or Gary or Cristy again.

name: Zach Richie
text: Not good service. Didnt believe we bought my wedding band there even though it was in the computer. Took it to get sized and it was never sized. The woman claimed we didn't have warranty on the ring and almost refused to give it to me. They finally found it in the computer and saying it wasn't purchased there and they pulled it up 2 weeks before hand. Will take my business elsewhere.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Ever since the store changed locations and employees the only kiss that begins with this Kay's is kiss customer appreciation and service goodbye.

name: farrah derusseaux
text: Awesome, Excellent Customer Service

name: Landon Smith
text: Love the staff here! Very friendly and helpful.

name: Ashley Kirby
text: I had the worst experience ever with this store. I took my engagement ring in for its 6 month checkup and to go down a quarter of a size. They told me to come back in two weeks and it will be here. So two weeks later we go in to get it and it’s been ruined when they went to go down a half a size. Had a huge gash in it, popped out two big diamonds and a diamond on the side. We were heartbroken, they also told us that it was a discontinued ring so they couldn’t reorder another ring and to pick another ring. So I spent a couple days looking and just couldn’t find any ring that I liked. So I ended up going to the Kay’s in bridgestreet and instantly falling in love with one. Told them the situation and they were so shocked. They said they had never had a ring be sent off and be ruined at their store. They told me to tell Decatur which one I wanted and they could have it ordered. So my fiancé called Decatur asking if they could have it in my size and ordered and the girl said absolutely you can, come tomorrow and we will have it all ready for you. Well we go the next day and the girls calling all these places just to come back to me to say we can’t get your ring in a size for you so pick another ring. I was so upset. They ruined my ring, then told me the night before they could just to have me go all the way to the store to tell me no they can’t pick another one. I was so angry I ended up leaving. I later in the week went back to the bridestreet and they were so shocked with Decatur’s performance to us, they said we can absolutely get you the ring you want in the size you need and they were confused why Decatur told us we couldn’t. They told us to go into Decatur, get our ring and walk out and call customer service. So we did and the store manager himself fixed us up at bridgestreet with the ring we wanted, plus the band, the size we wanted, and ensured us it would be in two weeks in time for engagement pictures. Yesterday my ring came in, it’s absolutely perfect!! It just goes to show Decatur is very unprofessional, their workers are unskilled and the store manager not once came to handle the situation or talked to us about it even when we were two feet away from her. Decatur has forever lost my service and bridestreet will forever by my hero’s who came in and cleaned up their mess.

text: I had a great experience there today 12/11/19 as usual. Brookwood always have a great selection of jewelry and great customer service. And I am one of those people who “wants to buy something but don’t know what” aka “the complicated, undecided shopper”. Today a young girl name Chariot helped me trade my old ring and pick a new one I wanted to give my mom for Christmas.  She was guided by the of the mangers, I didn’t get her name. But she was a cute middle age black woman. They suggested things to help me make a decision and I purchased my moms gift and actually felt good about it. (Unlike when I purchase something at other Kay’s and end up returning it LOL). Thanks for helping me today and keep up the good work. Soon you guys soon !!!

text: The manager, Christie, is one of the most nicest and most professional people that you will ever meet. My wife lost and earning and I was trying to replace it. Christie went above and beyond!!! name: Hannah Tell
text:
Go anywhere but here. Kays in general has some unethical sales practices. They WILL lie to you.

Returning the engagement ring we bought today because they told my anxiously excited BF the ring he picked was in my size (5) only to tell him after paying it was a 6 (another associate told me no ring in the store has EVER been in a 5) She just lied because she knew how badly he wanted to give me a ring now.

I plan to bring it back and tell her another kay store has it in my size just so I can hear her tell me "we never carry 5's" after that bold face lie she told my BF.

F*** Kays....they also told me id get an additional 10% off for getting a credit card, so I did even though we wanted to pay cash, only to be told right after getting approved the discount couldn't be applied. Now I'm stuck with their credit card. Seriously, just go ANYWHERE but kays. I have friends who have worked there and this is STANDARD.

name: Ashely Harrell
text: I truly want to give the ladies at the Kay Jewelers in the Riverchase Galleria Mall the biggest compliment I can. April and Christie went above and beyond with their customer service to help me with my issue and ensure all my needs were met. I had to get my wedding ring cleaned and repaired as a diamond had fell out. I sent the pieces of jewelry off mid-March and was expecting them back around early-April. My jewelry ticket consisted of one diamond in my band to be replaced, the three separate pieces sautered together, and the final ring cleaned. Upon mid-April, I did not hear from the store on the status of my ring so my husband and I went to the store in person to get an update. Ms. April informed me that the ring was being held because they wanted to make sure that I was okay with how the ring would potentially come out and discuss any pitfalls. I was informed there would be a potential gap in the ring once the pieces were sautered together. Upon me giving the okay, the ring was supposedly sent to be fixed and I continued to wait patiently. During that time, Ms. April helped me find two other LeVian rings that were on sale and that were absolutely gorgeous and suitable to wear at my job. I decided that once my other rings came back, I would get the two new rings resized for my finger. Coming into the first week of May, I discovered my ring was still not back and at this point I was getting very flustered. Ms. Christie spoke with me and ensured that she would get my ring repaired and back to me quickly and had apologized for the long wait. She personally made sure to let the jeweler know to expedite the process. When my ring finally did arrive back, the middle stone of the main ring was still cloudy, there was black residue on the ring bands, the ring was resized even smaller than my finger, and the same diamond was missing when it was presented to me. At this point I was livid, upset, and refused to do any more business with Kay Jewelers. Despite my ordeal, Ms. April and Ms. Christie showed me the greatest empathy for my situation. I was given a comforting and sorrowful hug from Ms. April. Ms. Christie personally took my ring to the jeweler and stayed with it until it was complete so that I would have the ring that same day and not have to wait any longer then I already had. In addition, she ensured that the other two rings that I recently purchased was resized that say day and back on my hand. These ladies truly exemplify the highest standard for customer service. My frustration and anger was not toward these two ladies but toward the poor service I received from the people repairing my ring. Now I do not take my ring off. Each ring or necklace I get from Kay’s is not just a piece of jewelry, but it is a story of my life. With these ladies understanding that, they will continue to earn my business from here on out.

She also told us you have to spend an outrageous amount to even redeem any of your "$1300" reward points. That same day I had my ring and band sent off to be resized. The sales lady told me that they would be ready on the twentieth, which was nearly two weeks. I showed up today to pick up my rings, and a very rude pretentious older sales man informed me that neither of my rings were ready to pick up and that I would have to come back another time. I was pretty pissed to say the least. And I am still waiting for a call about picking up my rings. I would not recommend this store at all.

text: Took my ring in for repair 1 week before Christmas and got it back in 3 days. It looks like a brand new ring. Neal Summers and his staff were very friendly and helpful.  I also did my last minute Christmas shopping there and everyone loved their gifts.

name: Sonya Williams
text: I have done business at Griffins Jewelers of Guntersville for many years now.  They go above and beyond to treat their customers with the utmost respect.   The quality of their merchandise is exceptional.  I have purchased custom orders and made purchases out of the jewelry case.  I have also had many repairs done with Griffins.  I will always recommend and use them for all of my jewelry needs.

name: James Long
text: We bought our wedding rings there about 10 years ago and everything was fine. So, naturally I went there first to get some repair done on another ring. The guy that's there now was really rude, condescending and unprofessional. I asked if they did repair work. The lady said yes. The man who does it is with somebody if you want to wait. That's fine. In my line of work, being busy is a good sign. So I waited. I could tell he didn't want the job because he immediately started in with the dismissive tone. I told him the ring is special and we would be willing to pay more than it's worth to get it fixed. It was a 3rd generation hand-me-down that meant a lot to my wife's grandmother. She shelled out all she had to buy it and everyone in the family knows the story. I asked him to throw out a number just to see what budget range I was looking at. He made some ambiguous comments that suggested it can't be fixed. I asked him if he meant that he did not have the skill to repair it. He seemed to take offense to that and quipped back that he did have the skill. So I asked what price range are we talking about. He said it's not about the skill or the price. So here I am wondering... if you do repair work, and you have the skill to do this, and it's not about the money. Then it must just be that he'd rather not. So I asked who the owner was and he said it was him. This guy, apparently he owns the place. What really bugs me the most is that we waited on him to finish with the other lady who he was really polite and professional with and then he treated me completely different. I don't know if it was because I had my kids with me or because I don't appear wealthy in jeans and a t-shirt. Or maybe he looks down on us because this ring that means so much to our family is beneath him to work on. I don't wear my social class on my sleeve, but I do have money. I run a freelance web development business and I do pretty well for myself and my family. We are not ashamed of where we come from. We're actually very proud. The next jeweler we called had our ring and our information taken within 30 minutes to be repaired. He said not only can it be done, but he gave us a price and said it's possible they may have it back in time for Christmas.

name: Nick Dobbins
text: Best Jewelry store in Marshall County!

name: Todd Hopper
text: Best  jewellers around  Always  VERY friendly and helpful 10 out of 5 star rating

name: Chuck Ellis
text: Nobody knows watches like Neal. He is "da man" when it comes to great deals on watches from Seiko to Rolex!

name: Fred Hoffman
text: Great place!

name: Jason
text: The Zales in Foley Alabama has employees that will mislead you. The told my wife a size 7 ring with wrap around stones could be sized to a 5. Then stated it would be a 3 to 4 week wait to get it sized, then recommended another jeweler to size it in 24 hours. We bought the ring ( over $1000) and went to the other jeweler who said there was no way he could sized it and they knew. When we took it back ( 1 hour later) they started acting like they could only refund $200, they did end up refunding the whole amount. This sale was a blatant lie from the beginning.  An attempt to make a sale at all costs and not refund your money. Full of lies.

name: Kathrine Steinbach
text:
I’ve always heard bad things about signet owned jewelry stores and big brand jewelry stores but I never experienced it first hand until I visited this store.

I received a lovely white sapphire ring as a gift which was purchased online. About a month after receiving the ring, it became apparent to me that the main stone was loose (it was not only wiggly and I could feel it, but it was actually rattling audibly). From being loose there was dust/dirt trapped between the stone and the basket of the stone. Keep in mind I had not been wearing it daily so it was surprising it came loose after such a short period of time.

I brought the ring to the foley Zales to have the sterling silver prongs tightened and the basket cleaned. The rep there said since it wasn’t purchased with warranty I had to pay out of pocket for both the cleaning and repair. It would cost $90.00. (Almost as much as the gift itself, but I couldn’t do anything about the fact it hadnt been purchased without a warranty and I wasn’t going to call up the person who gave it to because that would be rude).

When I picked up the ring I was ready to pay for services done, except the moment my hands touched it I knew it was still loose. I showed the representatives behind the counter and they swore up and down to me that it wasn’t loose and it was my imagination. They wiggled it and one even got her pen ink on it trying to “disprove” me.

They said they could send it back free of charge so I said ok. But I got a bad feeling and since it had become a sentimental gift I felt like I no longer trusted that store to handle it since I felt like they were lying to me about it not being loose. I asked them for it back and they said yes but they would have to charge me the $90.00. I didn’t want to have a confrontation with them so I paid and figured maybe I should just get a second opinion because it very well could be my imagination.

She swipes my card and is packing it up and I said “I hear it rattling, tell me you can’t hear that! Call me crazy, It can’t be my imagination!”

She held it up to her ear and to my surprise said “yes! I do hear it rattling. You’re not crazy”.

Im dumbfounded!! Before I paid, she said it wasn’t loose, lied to my face, then the moment I swiped my card, she acknowledged it was loose!!! I am appalled. I’m just going to dispute the transaction with my bank now because there is no way I trust the people working there. And I’m going to advise the person who purchased it for me to do the same. I won’t be making any purchases from jewelry stores like this again. I learned the hard way, at least this time it was only $90 instead of $900
