name: Caroline K
text: I really enjoy this store with their diverse and elegant products. However, I am so disappointed in how they are treating this pandemic. Only TWO of their employees were properly wearing masks when I went to have a watch serviced, whereas the other six employees had their masks below their chins. As someone who is immune compromised and takes a risk simply leaving the house, I felt like their business had ZERO regard for my safety. I couldn’t wait to get out of the store. I will not be supporting their business again, especially as there are many other jewelers in the area that are following the mask ordinance and keeping their patrons safe.

resp.text: Caroline, we are so sorry to hear this, but thank you for bringing it to our attention! I will personally make sure our store manager sees your message and addresses this issue to keep our customers safe. We sincerely apologize for making you feel unsafe, and we do hope you'll visit our stores again. We can certainly schedule virtual appointments and curbside pickup for anyone who is immune compromised or feels safer away from crowds during this unprecedented time. Again, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention!

resp.text: Thanks so much for you kind words! We appreciate your business so much!

name: Elena Perez
text:
This institution is wildly overpriced and not worth your time of day. They insist they have high standards for the diamonds they select, but they do not. Lastly, I believe they profiled my Latino boyfriend during our shopping experience.

To give some context, I sold high end jewelry for several years and helped with buying pieces for my store, custom designs for my clients, and sold many different watches and jewelry pieces from my store. I have a strong knowledge of diamonds and jewelry. I shopped at Bromberg in two capacities - both looking for an engagement ring as well as a simple bracelet repair. I'll start with the repair.

I brought my simple 14k gold bracelet to be shortened. The jeweler probably spent about 5 minutes to measure, cut and solder my bracelet together. I was charged $40. I also asked to be returned my spare gold. When I went to pickup my bracelet, they did not have the spare gold and told me the jeweler wasn't in so I could wait for a call. When I didn't receive a call, I called them. They said the jeweler knew about it and would find it for me. It took 4 days total and they then left me a message that "they think" they found it, but aren't sure, and asked me to bring my bracelet in for them to verify. I came in and the piece they had did not match, so they took my bracelet upstairs to go look, and did eventually find it. Overall this was a negative experience and the repair was much more expensive than either of the two jewelers I worked for personally.

Secondly, my engagement ring shopping experience. An associate (not Lemka) explained that they have a high standard for the stones they carry and the custom process if I were to go that route for the setting. The 2.01 carat D SI2 I looked at in store was priced well over $20,000, I can't remember the exact price but somewhere between 20-23k. When I went home, I pulled the GIA certification info on the stone and found there to be a massive cavity inclusion on the bottom of the stone that they failed to disclose to me. That cavity would get dirty over time and make the stone look worse. I'm disappointed they would even carry such a stone, let alone peddle it for such an incredibly high price. That stone was wildly overpriced as such and I wouldn't have purchased it, even at a deep discount due to the cavity.

During this visit, my boyfriend was with me looking at settings and diamonds, and briefly walked over to the watch counter to see what they had. When he started walking over there, one of the male employees shouted across the store for the security person to go over and stand by the watches. I felt awkward and insulted that they felt the need to call security over to babysit the area when we were already considering giving them our business on such a major purchase. I don't feel they would have had the same reaction if he was white and in a suit. Disappointing for it being 2020 and to still have such an experience.

After that event, I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt and went back to meet with the jeweler about a custom solitaire setting. He quoted me between 3-4K for a simple solitaire setting that I had handmade elsewhere for around $1550 from a well known local Chicago jeweler with a lifetime guarantee. Between the profiling incident and everything being wildly overpriced, I chose to take my business elsewhere. I love my 2.5 carat oval and custom setting I chose, and would not send anyone I know to Bromberg for any reason. If for some reason you insist on going there, be prepared to shell out extra cash simply for the mountain brook location, and be sure to work with Lemka.

resp.text:
Elena, we are so disappointed that you had a less than positive experience at our store. Thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention. I have passed your message along to our store manager.

We hate there was some miscommunication with your repair but are glad everything was resolved for you. As you can probably imagine, our jewelers see hundreds of repairs each week and occasionally slip ups do happen. Unfortunately yours involved an extra trip to the store to correctly identify your chain. We appreciate your patience with this!

We do regret we weren't able to find the right diamond and setting for you. All of our diamonds come with GIA certifications so we can be clear, upfront, and honest about every stone we sell. We try to keep a variety of diamonds in stock to fit all budgets and dreams, but we do sometimes have to order in more stones if we don't have exactly what you are looking for. You seem very knowledgeable about diamonds, and if you would like to discuss our stock and exactly what goes into the pricing, we would be more than to chat with you over the phone, in store, or by email.

As far as the profiling issue, all our staff members are trained to be aware of potential threats, and it sounds like this was not a threatening situation. We certainly do not make blanket judgments based on race or attire.  We make every attempt to make sure every customer feels welcome in our stores.  Please accept our apology for making you or your boyfriend feel uncomfortable in any way!

We are appreciative of your kind words about Lenka. We value her great customer service skills, and I have passed your positive comments about her along.

We are glad you found your dream ring even if it wasn't from our store. You are always welcome back to either of our locations anytime, even for free cleanings and prong inspection for your new ring. We sincerely hope we can help you again in the future with a better outcome!

name: Quinten Lochmann
text:
I was beyond impressed with Brombergs. My now fiance and I walked in one Saturday afternoon. She had no idea what she would want in an engagement ring. Angela was the one who helped us (But with every interaction I had with anyone from Brombergs I was deeply impressed) and she helped guide us even though at the time I was not looking to buy. I had actually planned on going online and picking something out that way. Except Angela blew me away with her customer service.

I ordered a custom ring and everything was perfect. The team got exactly what I was picturing in my head into an actual ring. It was quick and communication was always there. I would not change anything.

resp.text: Thank you for you great 5 star review and kind words! Angela is one of a kind, and we're lucky to have her on our team. We appreciate your business so much and hope to continue helping you in the future!

The time they take with me is never rushed and they are patient with me from the time am I come in until I leave. There was never a time I have left unsatisfied. Everything I have purchased from them has held up to its standards and I would recommend this store to anyone. From their customer service to merchandise you will definetly not be disappointed.

Outstanding experience. Am new to the Birmingham area and this was my first visit to Bromberg's (the Mountain Brook location). Had to special order a bracelet for an upcoming anniversary. I received excellent customer service from Adam Stoner, who is extremely knowledgable and helpful.

There were several special requirements I needed Adam's help with, which he took great care to address as the bracelet turned out to be absolutely stunning. The price was also very reasonable. I will be back, Bromberg's is now my go-to jewelry store.

name: Charles C
text: After looking around at many other places in Birmingham for an engagement ring (Diamonds Direct, Levis, etc) I ended up stopping by Brombergs because it was close to where I lived, and I thought I'd give it a try. It was a great decision that I would highly recommend to anyone. The atmosphere is very different than the other diamond retailers I visited. Instead of constantly being pressured to place a deposit on a diamond that was "an incredible deal that is here today and gone tomorrow" it felt more like I was working with a close friend that actually cared about my goals and was willing to answer all of my nitpicky questions without acting annoyed or rushed to try to land my sale and move on to the next customer that came into the door. If I were a new customer that was coming to give Brombergs a try, I would highly recommend working with Shannon. She worked with me throughout this whole process and helped me out more ways than I can count. I enjoyed working with Shannon so much that I asked it she would help me pick out the wedding ring as well as the wedding present. Long story short, Brombergs is a family atmosphere with reasonable prices and ask for Shannon!

resp.text: Thank you for your great review and kind words! We appreciate your business very much. Shannon is so knowledgeable, and we are lucky to have her on our team. We hope to help you again soon!

text: The engagement ring that I had now had for five years kept loosing diamonds every couple of months.  I was so frustrated with this happening. After about the fourth time of loosing a diamond Elizabeth told me she would talk to her manager to see if they could get me a new ring or just pick out a completely different one.  I sent it off that time and believe it or not, four months later a diamond was missing again. I went back up to Kay’s and luckily Elizabeth was there and I didn’t even have to explain to her what happened, she remembered every detail we had talked about.  I ended up picking out a simple solitaire ring. I hated having to change the ring design but luckily because of Elizabeth’s AMAZING customer service and patience the process was a breeze! Every Kay store needs an Elizabeth in their store!

To be told they would not help me because the watch was not bought from them(which I did not purchase the watch, it was a gift for my dad) put a nail in the coffin. I have spent a lot of money in there over the years but they will never receive another penny of my money. SUPER POOR BUSINESS PRACTICES!!!!!!!

name: Cara Rigby
text:
HORRIBLE MANAGER NAMED MICHELLE!!!

Worst Customer service ive ever experienced anywhere! Went to Kays about a week & a half ago to look and purchase an engagement ring with my fiance. Starting looking at rings in our budget and was only shown 1 ring which I loved (& the girl who showed us the ring got kinda in trouble for showing it to us) until they said they were having a diamond show & started showing me rings from those cases, apparently they only have a diamond show every so often and I was shown about 3 rings or so from those cases & ended up picking one of the 3 after being felt like those were the only ones in our budget and  I was pressured into it. We were able to get the ring sized that day & take it home.

Skip to week or so later, I decided to just browse online at rings that were in our budget & that said available in store at my local store. Came across several beautiful rings that I was NEVER shown to begin with so I decided to call and speak with the manager who helped us & told her about how I had seen a few online that said they were available in store & in our budget, so I go to the store to see them in person to make sure I didn't pick the wrong ring.
Got there & the manager who from the first visit was super helpful and nice, didn't speak to me once when I entered the store. I showed the girl who was helping me a few rings I seen online that said they were in store & the first ring she said " oh we just sold that ring" the 2nd and 3rd ring I showed her she Said " I don't think we have it" & I was like "why would it say it was in store if It wasnt?" She couldn't give me an answer. She did everything in her power to convince me to keep the ring I had but that pissed me off even more so I still ended up returning the ring which I know they aren't happy about, but I wasn't happy with being pretty much only shown options that benefited them. They didn't treat me the same as the first experience & u just don't do your customers that way. Regardless. I will do everything to make sure everyone is aware of how crooked this place is.

Also, after returning the ring (which was leased throigh progressive) we made an account online to see how the process of the refund was going, come to find out our total was double the price we were told it would be in store from the kay employees. The deposit we put down was suppose to be 79 dollars and would also be the amount of our monthy payment & after looking online we discovered they charged us 86 dollars for the deposit & that our payments would be 91.60 WEEKLY! We were told 79 dollars and some change monthly and then it shot up to 91.60 weekly! They never went over the contract or interest rate with us.

After the return I asked the employee if everything on their end was done and all we were waiting on was the leasing company to do their part. Called the leasing company to find out that they were waiting on KAYS to send the invoice over to get the refund process done & taken care of.

Called Kays once again to speak with the unprofessional, rude heifer off a "Manager" to make sure they sent the invoice in and to try to get some answers as to why she never vocally disclosed with us while signing the lease that our total was actually double the price she told us, & she would not answer the question. All she would say was "you made the return, what else do you need, blah blah.." How they can get away with is beyond me, after asking her multiple times times she actually HUNG UP on us. I called bk & another girl asnwer the phone, I continued to try to get answers we as customers deserved & as I was speaking the girl started pressing buttons on the phone & then hung up on me, incredibly immature & unprofessional. I am mind blown at my experience. I made a complaint with corporate, with the better business Bureau and got intouch with the district manager with the help of another kays manager of a different location!
KAYS IS A FREAKING JOKE, THEY LIE & NEVER FULLY DISCLOSE THE FULL TRUTH & PRICE TO THEIR CUSTOMERS IN ORDER TO MAKE THEIR SALES & COMMISSION!

text: Stopped in to have my wedding rings cleaned and Taylor was so helpful! He showed me that I had a few diamonds that were loose in my engagement ring. text: Creative Jewelers were able to help me find the perfect replacement posts for a pair of earrings that are sentimental to me. I appreciate the willingness to help and the professionalism shown to get the job done.

text: Billy, Brandi and the staff at Creative Jewelers could not be more professional and helpful.  They repaired and appraised a family pice for me and it looks wonderful. In addition, they have some really special gift options in the store so I was able to pick out a great birthday present for my sister!

name: Alvin Apger
text:
Everyone that I saw, was very pleasant. Billy, the gemologist, spent almost 2 hours with me, discussing the process of taking raw stones, having a lapidary cut them into the desired shape, and choosing the metal for the pieces of jewelry. It was all very fascinating and never did I feel rushed to make a decision. Now I’m even more excited to see the final items! Will definitely return!
Thank you so much!
Christine

resp.text: Thank you Christine for the kind words! It was a pleasure, and we are excited to see the final results!

name: James P
text: Walked in the door seemed everyone was to busy to speak, walk to the counter stood there forever without  a "Hi we'll be right with you" on my long walk out still no noise from anyone was heard. The folks just around the corner are the ones who gained a very good customer. Sorry guys

resp.text:
James, we are sorry that you feel your experience was enough to merit giving us a one star review on this platform. We thrive on giving every customer a great experience when they're in our store, so we hate to hear you didn't get the same experience. When you called before you arrived, you mentioned you had questions about your rings, and we asked you to bring them by.  You said that was fine, and that it was nice outside for a good walk. When you came in, both of us were already with customers working on custom designs, so we weren't able to break away to help you right then, and we were the only employees in the store today. When you walked over to look at our men's ring display, I acknowledged you but I don't think you noticed, which is fine, it was a little loud in the store at the time. We hate that you weren't able to stick around for a few more minutes, because we would have loved to help you.

We hope that you did find the help you were looking for, because we know that is what's most important. We truly appreciate your feedback, and we hope you have a wonderful day!

name: James Havranek
text: Very friendly, professional, and courteous staff, who went out of their way to make me feel welcome and create my pieces. I received my jewelry, today, and am very pleased. They have purchased another piece with me in mind. I'll continue to use their services. And, many thanks.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, James! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Cynthia Hibbett
text: Great experience!  They take care of their customers

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Mary Ann Powell
text: I recently needed to have the watchband on my Citizen Solar powered watch repaired and was referred to CREATIVE JEWELERS (in downtown Florence, Al) by a friend.  The salesperson, Taylor Schweighardt, was extremely nice and told me they generally did not do watch repair, however he asked me what I needed. I explained that the clasp kept opening while on my wrist and I was unable to wear it for fear of losing it. Since the repair was not on the watch itself but only on the band he attempted to repair it right then but was unsuccessful. However, he offered to call Citizen and find out if he could get a replacement band (witch he didn't have to do). He called me the next day and said that Citizen had discontinued that specific band and they had nothing comparable. Since that was the case, I told him he might as well just dispose of the watch since there was nothing else that could be done. I thanked him for going out of his way to do everything he could to salvage my watch. At home I got on line and considered purchasing a new watch but changed my mind since I had another less expensive watch I could wear as a replacement until I could purchase something better. Two days passed and Taylor had called and left me a message to call him.  When I did he had good news.  He and the owner of the shop (Billy) had put their heads together and figured out how to repair the band. I was so surprised, I was speechless!  I went to get it the next day and asked  how much I owed them and they said no charge.  I insisted on paying them but they said no, but any referrals would certainly be appreciated.  They specialize in stunning hand created top of the line diamond and gem jewelry, and I might add, thoughtful, top of the line service as well!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, it was our pleasure to be able to assist you!

name: Calhoun2
text:
The staff here is great! I carried in a ring that I'd bought elsewhere and they gladly sized it for me. They were very affordable too. I initially dealt with Taylor when I called for information about sizing. He was extremely knowledgeable and took the time to discuss options with me. Both the day I dropped off the ring and the day I picked it up, I dealt with Billy, the owner. Super nice guys, couldn't ask for friendlier, more knowledgeable Jewelers.
(The store's mascot, Bernadette, is icing on the cake!)
They have beautifully crafted, custom jewelry. Some pieces are truly breathtaking.
Stop in and look around or just go in for the friendly conversation. I highly recommend Creative Jewelers.

I felt certain my mother would not give me a fake diamond and suspected foul play, so I took it to another jeweler who indeed confirmed that it was real. And just to be sure, I took it to another, and then another. Three jewelers confirmed it is a real diamond but this guy at Sjirleys tries to tell me it's a fake and says I should buy a real one from him and he can "swap it for the fake" diamond in my wedding ring. What a low-down, dirty, evil snake this guy is.

text: I've been a member here for several years. I still like this gym but try to avoid it during peak hours! My only complaints are that the wi-fi is terrible and when group exercise classes are in session you can't find space to do stretching!

name: Cindy Dittman
text: Beautiful store,  beautiful jewelry. The clerks were very helpful and pleasant. We left a piece for repair and admired several others. Best marine life jewelry I've seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Cindy! It’s clients like you who make us our best 💎

name: Jerry Broadway
text: We were in town for a beach wedding.  Several hours before the wedding, I realized that I had not checked off one very important item on my Father of The Bride to-do list: picking up a ring as a gift for our daughter.  I frantically searched Google and found Frank & Co. I showed up at 12:30 with a picture, and they matched it as closely as possible. At 1:45, it was resized and gift wrapped. Fantastic service, and my daughter was thrilled with her ring!

resp.text: Jerry, it was a pleasure! Congratulations on the upcoming nuptials. Come see us again, and thank you for the amazing review 🙌🏻

name: Jane Taylor
text:
Wonderful store. Everyone is trustworthy. Everything is done exactly how you want it. I got a special ring worked on, and it was perfect.
They have never let me down.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Jane! It is always a pleasure to serve you.

name: Michaelle Leath
text: I had a loose stone that Frank mounted into a ring. He did an incredible job and the customer service was amazing. After having its size for my right hand I decided I wanted the ring to fit on my left. Frank had no problem resizing the ring and made it fit like a glove. They really treat you like family.

resp.text: Thank you Michaelle!! It was our pleasure to help! Have a great weekend.

name: Karen Gentry
text: I am beyond impressed !!! He was so kind and helpful ! He even cleaned 2 of my rings I was wearing ! I highly recommend them to anyone and everyone !

resp.text: Thank you so much, Karen! We look forward to serving you again.

name: Erskin Hickman
text: Doing a bit of Christmas shopping. Visited seven jewelery stores in the area. By far, Frank & Co. was the best experience. Friendly, professional staff. Great selection. Recommend them highly!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the amazing review!

name: Carol Stine
text: Each time I have been there it has been a good experience. They are friendly, professional, knowledgeable, and reasonably priced. I highly recommend them for any jewelry needs, whether for new jewelry or repairs.

name: MRS. FLYE
text: Great displays,  True fine Jewelry. Jack is very Personable and Professional.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Raylene Caldwell
text: Completely satisfied with the experience at Frank & Co. Frank, Jack and the girls were a pleasure to work with, they were extremely helpful, and they carry a wide variety of jewelry. Thank you all for an enjoyable experience!

name: Casah Crowson
text: I bought my husband a watch as an Anniversary gift and he absolutely loved it. I also have had a few repairs done and I am always happy with the finish product. And currently they are designing a few gifts for our children...I am so thrilled to have such a great and talented group in Orange Beach!! I will be a life-long customer!!

resp.text: Thank you C.C. ❤

name: Inyce Lapine
text:
As always Frank and Page take care of me!!!
Y’all are the best. Thank you so much. It’s like shopping with family.
Thank you

name: Meredith Spanton
text: Brought in several rings to be repaired/restored. They did an amazing job! Knowledgeable and friendly! Would definitely do business again.

name: weslyn reed
text: Beautiful jewelry! Did repair in few hours. I’m still thinking of the diamond I saw earlier!

resp.text: Thank you, Stacie, for the glowing review! 🙌🏻

name: Jamie Carswell
text: Excellent customer service from all associates. Was made to feel welcome and appreciated!

name: Shawn Lawrence
text: Mr. Frank thank you for doing such an amazing job on my wife's wedding ring. She lost her main diamond during a move a few months ago and she was heart broken. I'm happy that we were referred to you from a friend that said so many good things about your work.  The diamond you selected for replacement is beautiful and the rebuild of the mount is so much stronger.

name: Charlene Zahand
text:
Frank & Co. Are a team of jewelry geniuses.  I have been using Frank as my jeweler for over 10 years for all my repairs and custom creations. I trust noone else. I cant say enough about the outstanding work they do. I highly recommend that everyone establish a relationship with "A" jeweler. Dont just hand your tiny treasures over to just anyone.  Frank &Co is reliable, dependable, affordable and their customs are extraordinary! Try them once and you'll be sold!

Charlene Zahand ( area business owner)

resp.text: Charlene, Frank & Co. is honored to serve you for your jewelry needs and thanks you for your glowing review!

name: Dana Pohli
text: I have gone to Designed by You for a very long time. And have had several pieces made. I have since moved a long way away, and will continue to go to Frank by mail now. Work is the absolute best. He manages to create what you want. Very pleased.

name: john smith
text: Took my watch to have sized.very nice people and fair prices.love the small businesses.

resp.text: Thank you for the stunning review!

name: christy Daniel
text: Frank was extremely helpful in fixing my rings and making sure my diamonds were secure in the brackets. Additionally he cleaned them and they are sparkling and beautiful. Thank you for great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you Christy, I'm so glad we could help!! We love happy customers ❤❤

name: henry Jones
text: They are super awsome! ALWAYS take care of my needs .Please go see all the great stuff they have!!

name: Steve Neitzel
text: Great Sevice Today on my Watch & New Battery.

name: Bill Howard
text: Absolutely the best around.

name: Darren Metz
text: Great customer service and craftsmanship!

name: Kristen Rayborn
text: Always friendly and love their jewelry.

name: Leah Lucky
text: Frank is the best! Affordable, nice, and fast! I’d recommend this store to anyone who has any jewelry needs!

name: Ann McFadden
text: Always enjoy looking and buying

resp.text: Thanks, Ann! We enjoy seeing you!

name: Sonja R. Thomas
text: Frank has always taken great care of our family. So, instead of sitting in traffic on Canal Road stop on and see his beautiful designs.

name: B Braddock
text: Frank does great work on jewelry.  I highly advise checking him out if you want a custom piece created.

name: Laura Braddock
text: I so love my necklace and watch. It was perfect.

name: Michelle Boudreaux
text: He did a good job with my necklace but I'm giving 2 stars because when I dropped it off I asked the lady in the front how much it was going to cost. I guess she didn't know an exact about so she told me it would be not be much since it was just sterling silver. Then she said "just a few dollars". In my mind I'm thinking ok then it will be about $15 or so. Well when I went back the lady was not in the front and I was charged $30. It was a simple break and I can't believe it cost that much. I won't be back

name: Garrett Spence
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here for a great deal, very nice and helpful!

name: Thomas Grimshaw
text: Great selection and great customer service. Highly recommend!!!

name: Monica Canady
text: Got  beautiful ring for a Christmas from hubby!  Love it and plan to take it to be sized!

name: Matthew Bankston
text: Great jewelry company!

name: Julie Mathis
text: Wonderful experience with selecting diamond wedding set and rings. Quality, sparkling diamonds, with a professional staff! Wonderful warranty for the jewelry as well.

name: Meeka Acklin
text: If I could negative a thousand I would. Someone at this store stole my bracelet I ordered online to be sent to this store. Ordered online for a Christmas gift, got tracking info & it was delivered to the store 12/15. The store gave me 3 different stories about what happened to my product, provided a different tracking number. Customer had the HARDEST time trying to get someone on the phone at the store. This was a Christmas gift. Then customer service is just as bad. Ordered 12/11/2020 & it’s 1/18/2021, I have no product or no refund. I would recommend NEVER ordering from Zales & dealing with the Zales at the Galleria. Worst store EVER.

name: Martin Howell
text:
We've shopped here for years. Their service is great!
They are exercising safe COVID protocols.

name: Buck Caradine
text: They are all nice in this store. Quick to help you.

name: Candy Laine
text: Do not shop with Sam. She's super rude. She threw away part of a necklace that I had a warranty on because we didn't have the other tiny piece to it. I had to call the district manager in order to get it rectified. She kept interrupting us while we were talking to the assistant manager talking to us in a condescending way. Worst experience ever.

name: Kristina Sims
text: The warranty is bs bc they will replace a 2 carat diamond if lost but not the chain? AFTER we purchased lifetime! The ladies were extremely rude and acted as if they owed the mall. Will it be back!! Don’t trust those people

name: Ephraim Maynard
text: Great Sales Staff. They are very helpful and kind. This time Sam helped me pick out a great present for my wife's birthday. Sam was wonderful and knowledgeable about everything she showed me.

name: Tammy Otten
text: Very rude, will not do warranty inspection without an appt nor on Sunday's

name: Roy ORR
text: Customer service is Excellent

name: Rodney Burnes
text: Very nice selection!

name: becky Hall
text: Buyers beware!!! My fiancé bought my engagement ring from here. I came to get it sized and it came back with a diamond missing and the size was wrong. The salesperson, Sam told me everything goes to corporate so I thought it was in good hands. They sent it off again and went it returned it was a whole other ring. My beautiful ring was completely scratched up and 4 of my once flawless colorless diamonds were now visibly yellow! Turned out that Sam lied to me because it had went to a local jeweler. The managers excuse were the diamonds must of gotten burnt. There were many other excuses but this one was most shocking. Diamonds don’t burn!! We told them we wanted the original diamonds put back in and have it appraised to see if it matched our original cert card and they refused. All trust was out the window and we had no choice but to return it. They have made the whole experience a complete nightmare and have now ruined my engagement. I’ve heard horror stories of this place swapping diamonds before and clearly they’re still doing it! Do not buy from these people they commit fraud with no conscience.

name: Ashley Robertson
text: We are always greeted warmly and treated kindly. They don't try to push anything on you and are very helpful.

name: ladonna crum
text: Shazi and Jari (manager) were very accommodating and professional.  They both displayed exceptional customer service and a high level of professionalism. GREAT JOB!

name: Tameka Jamison
text: Customer Service is awesome! Our sales associate remembered our faces, and the type of ring I desired!!!! Sam is the Best!!!

name: frank johnson
text: Sam was perfect in every way as a sales person. I came in the store with a set amount in mind. Needless to say that didn't stay 😊. Great sales pitch, created a warm environment with a family atmosphere. I was very pleased with my purchase and would recommend any and everyone whose in the need for any type of jewelery to visit Zales in the mall and ask for Sam 😊

name: Randy Hollis
text: Mrs Sam is a amazing person she has helped me beyond. Very nice women. She is very good at helping.

name: SaTrisha Moore
text: Sam was very nice and helpful. She is very knowledgeable. I would recommend her for any jewelry needs.

name: Lawrence Darksavior
text: I visited the store for the first time and it was a great experience from start to finish both of the sales people Erin & Mike really went above & beyond to make sure I was taken care of.

name: John Doe
text:
The Good
* nice selection of rings and jewelry
* competitive prices with other jewelry dealers
The Bad
* staff is very rude (two Indian ladies)the worst
* very pushy and try to rush you to make a selection
* not honest about warranty if you don't have it in writing then you don't have it at all..
* they tried to add other services on my purchase without telling me

name: Jonathan Norman
text: Awful experience all around. They butchered and destroyed my fiancé’s ring when she sent it off to be sized, twice. The lack of taking responsibility along with the lies and excuses the staff made up were beyond baffling. I will never set foot in this place again.

name: Shane Williams
text: Sam was awesome and very professional and made me feel comfortable and didn't make me feel pressurized to buy. She took her time and helped me find the perfect ring!

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Shazi is wonderful!!!! She has made me want to continue to be a Zales customer. After dealing with the Trussville store 3 separate times and having no success in getting answers in getting a wedding band and a certification cardfor my engagement ring, she took 30 minutes out of her time to take care of us. She got with her manger about getting our cert card and then explained in detail why my engagement ring that was purchased in May was no longer being made as well as the band to accompany it. She then worked diligently to find a band that complimented my ring. If not for her we would’ve taken our bus was to Kay’s or Jared’s and been done but she took time out of her day to handle a simple customer service issue and made us her personal customers for life.

name: Bethany
text: Very poor experience. Clearly commission based, where no one wants to be inconvenienced to clean/inspect your ring to keep up the warranty as instructed; only to wait on those to make a sale. Waited a very long time for my turn and was treated incredibly rudely. Do not plan to ever purchase anything from them again.

name: Kayla Lorence
text: Horrible customer service from both Indian ladies. The older Indian lady had a straight up attitude. They treat customers different depending on if they are coming in to buy something new vs. getting something cleaned or replaced. I don’t know if it’s a commission thing or it’s just who they are. ( where they realize they won’t be getting any commission off of you, therefore service is bad). I honestly don’t know.

name: Stephanie Donnell
text: I went to exchange my ring, and the sales representative Shazi was amazing. She was very helpful! She took her time showing us rings and very patient.

name: Jalesa Mitchell
text: Sam was amazing , go check her out ! She did everything she could to get me the ring of my dreams !!!!

name: Naia “Shiro” Ōkami
text: Went to look at engagement rings with my fiance and her sister. Was not acknowledged by any staff. Tried multiple times to at least get my presence acknowledged and was treated terribly. Lost a customer that was ready to buy!

name: Fred Beeson
text: Shazi is the best ! She helped me pick out the perfect diamond. No pushy sales tactics with her. Very helpful and professional.

name: S Taylor
text: I bought a ring here, and brought it in soon after because I noticed scratches on it and needed them to clean it. When I went to go get my ring, the employee I dealt with had a poor attitude. I asked her if anything was wrong, and she didn't say anything. I won't be going back here again.

name: main man
text: Ask for Shazi or Sam both are friendly and helpful..knowledgeable about all things diamonds.

name: Jordyn Gilley
text: Do not waste your hard earned money here. My ring has broken twice in 2 months, not to mention the first time it took them 3 weeks to return it. The second time 4 weeks. And even then they won't call you to tell you it's ready. You literally have to call every day and pester them to see if it's back from repair.

name: Judy Pruett
text: If you are wanting the best Jewelry Consultant, ask for Shazi! She is extremely knowledgeable and personable  She takes her time to find out what you are looking for.

name: Brittany Lamb
text: Buyer beware!! I searched for months to find a ring that I wanted for Christmas. My husband I went to the Galleria location to get my size and we wanted to look at the one I had found. Unfortunately it was an “online only” item. The woman who got my size acted as if she was not only inconvenienced by us but as if she was better than us. So my husband ended up ordering the ring and gave it to me on Christmas Eve. When I took it out of the box and put it on I noticed one of the diamonds were missing. My husband immediately called their 1-800 customer service number and they directed us to take the ring to the nearest Zales and they would decide wether to have the ring repaired or replaced. Being Christmas Eve night the location was closed and closed the next day for Christmas. We went to the Galleria location on December 26th and when we explained the situation to an employee they went and got the manager. The manager then asked what we wanted done. I told them I wanted it fixed. Then they asked if I had the paper work for the diamond bond that came with it. I told them no that it should be fixed period considering it was a brand new ring. After about 30 minutes of talking to the manager she said she would take care of it and we wouldn’t have to use the diamond bond and we wouldn’t have to pay for anything. I even went ahead and bought the extended warranty on the metal and the sapphire. The manager said it should be ready by January 7th. When that day got here my husband called and it was not ready yet. Well my husband got a call yesterday, January 10th, that the ring was ready and that it was going to cost $110. When we got there to pick up the ring the woman that was working was the rude woman that waited on us before and the one that rang up my extended warranty. She told us it was going to be the $110. I told her we weren’t paying a dime that the manager was supposed to be taking care of it. Apparently the manager was not there and had made no notes of anything!! I got extremely frustrated and upset. Eventually, after getting verbal and irrate, another employee came over and tried to calm me down. The woman ended up giving us the ring and not charging us. None of this should have ever happened. I will never buy another thing from Zales again!!

name: Stephen Glass
text: Terrible staff they are rude. Be careful they will charge you more and not tell you that they added stuff to your receipt.

name: Juarron Jackson
text: Ms sam andMrs Shazi are very professional and friendly I had a great experience .And I will like to come back next time with my friends

name: HayRed
text: The sales lady seemed bordeline psychotic. My boyfriend and I wanted to look at engagement rings that I had seen online just to see what they looked like in person. We told the sales lady multiple times we were NOT buying a ring, yet she kept pestering. "Why are you not buying a ring today? Why can't you? You can just give me your credit card you don't have to give me any money today." Then she says to my boyfriend, "Is it because she's here with you?" And then she proceeds to look at me and say, "Can I speak with him alone please?" Needless to say I said NO and we left. Crazy!!! Don't go to this jewelry store. My boyfriend and I both left angry.

name: Da Mo
text: Do not buy from zales, at least not this store. Made the mistake of buying from there. The lady was super pushy and she literally was forcing me to buy. Don't waste your time and money.

name: HeavyChevy17
text: I will never buy anything again from zales thanks to pushy Sam.

name: E
text: Saleslady was super pushy and would not listen to neither me nor my wife. Also do not let her check your credit, never signed anything and they opened a line of credit anyway. Then I call and she was rude and did not want to listen again. Best advice is to go to DD or somewhere else, completely unprofessional.

name: Stephanie Earley
text: Sam, the saleslady, was ULTRA pushy. I know it's a commission job, but seriously, she    tried to force a sale on me. Definitely better jewelry stores in the Galleria. Try Helzberg or Kay.

name: Bridgette McBride
text: I went there in September and I was really impressed with Shazi. She was very helpful and friendly. I really couldn't decide what I wanted. Shazi gave me her card and asked me to come back. Well I must say I traveled 4 hours to get there. I came back on the 9th of December and I stopped by. Shazi had a customer but she noticed that I was waiting for her. Very good customer service. After she got through she helped me and I promised I love my rings. Again,I really couldn't decide what I wanted but she helped me all the way. Once I finished she thanked me and actually came from behind the counter and gave me a hug. I promise you can't find customer service like that all the time. Shazi u keep up the good work and I assure you that it will take u far in life. Thanks again Shazi☆☆☆☆☆

name: B Little
text: wouldn't shop here,they are not serious enough with buyers,and try to push different merchandise other than what you want.I wanted white gold,they pushed yellow gold,but a selection of white gold mens necklaces available.Figgaros,cubans,so forth and so on....

name: Kenyun Moore
text: I incourage you to go spend money some and to visit with Sales associate (Sam)

name: Aki Shin
text: Very bad experience. The customer services look very evil, when I got into the store, they looked at me unfriendly. And when I left, they talked and laughed, very rude.

name: Mrs Patrick
text: No words, do not buy from zales

name: John Lentine
text: A great store and wonderful owners, every time we are in Fairhope we always stop and always come away with some great jewelry. Cant say enough good things about them!

name: Graciela Blanno
text:
I could never say enough fantastic things about this place! I came here last year in November and purchased a bunch of turquoise rings, deco rings, etc . I had the BEST experience and the customer service was nothing like I had seen before . The owner is so kind and he was knowledgeable, helpful, and trusting. He really let me take my time and assisted me every time I wanted to look at something . I live in Atlanta and this shop by far exceeds any shop I’ve ever been too . I came back last weekend while on a mini vacation and the same excellent customer service! Please support this business . The owner is so kind and clearly cares about his customers . The jewelry is beautiful and I always leave with many treasures . Very fair pricing as well! I would highly recommend and give 10
Stars if I could! If you want to feel welcomed and in a warm environment this is your spot. ! Can’t wait to come back! Thank you thank you!!!!

I left with a beautiful silver and green bracelet and more rings. I also purchased some gorgeous silver hoop earrings

resp.text: It was great to see you again!  Thank you so much for coming in & the great review! We look forward to your next visit to Fairhope!

name: Marie
text: Love this store and this family! Wonderful people who are so willing to help you find the perfect piece! I visit often and always see new and exciting merchandise I can't resist! And their fur baby, Luke, is so sweet!

resp.text: Thank you Marie, we are always happy to see you!  Luke loves seeing you too!

name: Chief Bowles
text: Great unique place... The nicest people that run this place... It's a heartfelt kinda place, a touch of soul, like you were meant to go there feeling. A little of everything from collector's items to great gifts for loved one's. This place is worth seeing!

resp.text: Thank you so much!   It was a pleasure meeting you & helping find something perfect for you wife!

name: Jackson Wade
text: I try and come here every week they are the only coin and jewelry store I go to because they are so nice

resp.text: Thank you Jackson,  We always look forward to seeing you!

name: Andrew nerdalert
text: I Just found my new favorite store . I am so happy I stopped by. Its rare to find passion and knowledge and customer service in one place . I highly recommend this store

resp.text: Thank you Andrew, it was a pleasure taking care of you!

name: A
text: This is a wonderful jewelry store! They have a beautiful selection and some really unique items. Chris assisted us and was very helpful and patient. We appreciated the option to trade and were able to get something we really liked which was much nicer than we expected to be able to have. Thanks so much.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley, it was a pleasure helping you find the perfect ring & meeting your darling children!

name: Silver Mandalorian
text: I was not happy with a purchase that I had made so I returned it and was given a refund with no hassle. The customer service is top notch.

name: Phillip Tucker
text: Small shop . Helpful staff but not that knowledgeable about coins. It's worth the stop to see if they have what u are missing in your set

name: Cathy Beck
text: Beautiful Jewelry. I had some pieces repaired and the cost was less than I expected.

name: Haden Sisk
text: Wonderful jewelry at fantastic prices!  Bob, George, and Chris have all been very helpful, I bought my wife a gorgeous gold pendant here for such a low price that I also bought her a cameo pin! We will definitely deop by to pet Luke next time we are in fairhope!

name: Damien Dykes
text: Awesome place I'll definitely be back

name: Cherie Dunavan
text: Professional and friendly owners! They have a beautiful selection.

name: Ruby Hill
text: Never been here

resp.text: Hi Ruby, I hope you can come in someday & see all the beautiful, unique things we have to offer.  Thank you

name: Heather Delker
text: Wonderful owners are very helpful.

name: Sam Keske
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here while we were both in grad school at Auburn, and still enjoy visiting with everybody when we visit. The signature jeweler in Auburn, and family owned for many years - you may even catch Ronnie Ware on a good day. Great for Tacori, Rolex, John Hardy, etc., down to Christmas ornaments and glassware.

name: Cindy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Anwar LNU
text:
Met Lisa on my most recent visit to Auburn.  I am in the market for a Rolex and she was the consumate professional, extremely knowledgeable, charming and polite.  She educated me regarding the demand for these timepieces and wished me well even though she didn't have what I wanted at the time.
Would definitely suggest a visit to Ware Jewelers if you are in the market for a Rolex and definitely ask for Lisa!

name: Scott Holley
text: I have been doing business with Ronnie and Tina for 20 years. They have great merchandise and service. They are always so helpful. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tammy Benda
text: I love working with family businesses that treat you right and value your business.  Ware is one of the best!  The jewelry is what brought me in.  The people make it the only place I will shop for jewelry again.

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather and given to my grandmother. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force in a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring, and shortly after, the diamond fell out... the list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! We are totally heartbroken over the pearls and wouldn’t want anyone else to ever experience that!

name: Austin Till
text: McKee is absolutely wonderful and the biggest help I could have ever asked for. I go to her for all my gift needs. You won't be disappointed with her friendly, Grade A service.  If you're looking for someone helpful, look no further. I will continue to be a Ware customer as long as McKee is employed there.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I live in Montgomery but while I was in Auburn I went by Ware's to see if they could adjust the band on a Cartier watch I was wearing. Ware's doesn't sell Cartier, but I know they sell and repair Rolexes so I felt confident in their ability to work on my Cartier. They did a quick and excellent job, of course. One of these days I'm going to get one of their Auburn watches!

resp.text: Thank you, Carol!  It's always a pleasure to be of service.

name: Parker Johnston
text: I had a very good experience at Ware today.  Worth the trip over from Columbus.  Justin fixed my watch while I waited and it looks great.  Thanks and great job!

resp.text: Thank you, Parker!  We're glad to know it was worth the trip.  We appreciate you going out of your way to entrust your watch to us!

name: Ben McCoy
text: I have bought all my wife's jewlery here even living in another state I always come back!  Jo is the best at keeping me out of the dog house!  They have the best prices and make sure everything is perfect!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben!  Jo does have a talent for helping pick out just the right gift to help soothe the raging seas.

name: Michele Kostelecky
text: We loved our experience at Ware Jewelers!  Thank you so much for being so kind and helpful to us.  Lisa Stevens was great and making us feel at ease and comfortable in our purchases and decisions.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Michelle!  Lisa's a real gem, and we're glad you had such a wonderful experience working with her.

name: Lexie McCormick (Lexie)
text: Ware Jewelers is the only jewelry store I will shop at. Everyone is so nice and you get help as soon as you walk in the doors! They have the prettiest jewelry I have ever seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Alexis!  We always want to make everyone feel right at home when they come through our doors!

name: Paul Berngard
text: Amazing experience.  Lisa is excellent and gives the best customer service.   Have purchased numerous timepieces from her and will only go through her for future buys.   If you are looking to get a Rolex or any other piece of fine jewelery do not hesitate to go see Lisa.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Paul!  We agree completely that Lisa's service and knowledge are top-of-the-line, and we count ourselves lucky to have her.

name: J Sims
text: Went in with my Girlfriend this evening looking for engagement rings for her. Was served by Jennifer, her service was superb. And the selection was just as fantastic. Will definitely be purchasing my rings from Wares.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  I know Jennifer will be thrilled to help you find the perfect ring when the time comes!

name: Kimberly Burns
text: Friendly & helpful customer service. Beautiful jewelry. I've been a loyal customer for over 30 years!! Love Ware Jewelers!!  😀

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kimberly!  It means the world to us that you've trusted us for so long!

name: Ann Canon
text: Wares has been, in my opinion, the top jewelry store in the southeast. When I need to shop for jewelry or for gifts I always shop there first. My mother never shopped anywhere else for wedding gifts.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ann!  It really means the world to us to hear from our long-standing clients.  You and your mother really exemplify the kind of local connections that have kept us in business for 70 years now.

name: Luis Dopico
text: Ware Jewelers is absolutely the best jewelers. I have tried several other jewelers since moving away from Auburn and I have never had the same level of service and quality. Now, I will only go to Wares for new items or repair or redesign of older items. I have learned my lesson. It doesn't pay to go anywhere else. Also, I wanted a custom piece made and the jewelers at Ware's exceeded anything I could have ever imagined. They don't just create jewelry, they create memories. Thanks to Lisa Stevens who is absolutely amazing to work with and will do whatever it takes to make sure you find exactly the special piece you are looking for!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Luis!  It means the world to us that you've been so satisfied with our services for so long.  We'll do our best to keep exceeding expectations and hope to keep you happy for many years to come!  And lest I forget, yes, Lisa really does go above and beyond to make sure her clients get taken care of.  We're glad you've gotten to experience that first hand!

name: Chennan Xue
text: Very helpful and friendly staffs. Helped me adjust my watch strap (actually twice) and didn't charge me. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated! We are always just a phone call or email away ! Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Melissa!  It was a pleasure having you in, and we loved helping you!

text: I'm surprised at the negative reviews I have read because each time I've been there the staff has always been nothing but friendly and helpful. The jeweler is extremely knowledgeable and the staff are really helpful with assisting you with picking out what best suits your needs instead of what is going to make them the biggest sale. One of the reviews states that the selection is very limited. I have not found that to be the case for I think they have a great selection and their prices are extremely reasonable. They helped me pick out a beautiful wedding band and will be sizing and repairing some more of my jewelry for me. I plan on making them my exclusive jeweler. Do yourself a favor and don't count them out because of the two negative reviews on here. Go see them for yourself. You won't regret it.

text: Isbell's designed an engagement setting for us for an asscher cut stone that other well-known jewelers seemed to have a difficult time assisting us with. They did a great job helping us find a setting to perfectly compliment it and later made a matching eternity band. They have the most amazing jewelry, especially their custom pieces, for a great price. They are the kindest people and you will not find individuals who are more knowledgeable and talented anywhere around. I get compliments weekly and it's been a few years since my engagement setting was done; that says something in my book. If you have something "custom" in mind or a love for "vintage" and one-of-a-kind pieces, this is your place! :)

name: Matthew dickey
text: I came to peewees In need of some cash. I dealt with Alfred Streeter. He’s very honest and straightforward and it’s a no haggle kind of deal. You are in and out. Each time I have dealt with him he has given me a fair price for what I have pawned or sold. We’re talking about a pawnshop here so you’re not going to get what your item is worth. They are in the business of making money so if you expect that you need to sell your stuff on let go or something to someone who is willing to pay the price. But if you are in need of some quick cash and a fair price I would highly recommend peewees time on Charlotte Road. The whole staff is very nice but Mr. Streeter has always been a straight shooter.

text: Great service and very kind and understanding

name: Jennifer Osman
text: I went in Pee Wee pawn shop today and my experience was not a good one. I have never in my life had someone treat me the way this employee did. If I knew her name I would absolutely call her out. This was at the Trussville location and there were only two employees that I saw. But it was the woman that happen to be available when I came into the store. She was a straight up ass hole. Rolling her eyes when I asked a question as if it was the dumbest thing she had ever heard.  Or as if I was waisting her time. As I told her what I needed to pawn her attitude towards me was hateful from the start the least she could do is be polite and say that they were not interested in what I was trying to pawn at the time. Instead she said she would maybe give me a dollar for it. As she laughed under her breath. That behavior was so uncalled for. And then when I pointed out something on the clearance table that was still marked 60 dollars she stomped her foot and in a aggrevated tone said ok fine let me see it. Now I understand what she was telling me. And I understand why that product that was similar to mine was on the clearance table because it wasn't  selling well. But none the less it was still worth more than a dollar. But she apparently thought I could not comprehend that because of  her childish body gesture's. What she would not take the time to hear was that I had no intention of letting my item be sold in the store. I just needed to pawn it for a little while because life is not easy sometimes but thanks for making my day a little brighter. I wasn't looking for sympathy when I went in, but is it to much to ask for you to just be polite to someone you don't know.   Finally I said to the woman, " you know what, I haven't done anything to you to deserve such a attitude. I will never be back to this store again." And then she had the audacity to reply with, " good deal you have a great day!" GOOD DEAL!!!! Are you kidding me. If you hate your job that much then go do something else instead of being a jerk to your customers I really don't think the owner would appreciate that at all. I know if I had worked hard enough to open three different location and had all that going the last thing I would want is people walking through my doors to be treated that way. But I didn't act a fool because I have more class than that I just kept walking and took my business to another pawn shop who did let me pawn my item and gave me way more than a dollar for it.

name: Christina Wilson
text: My friend and I literally sat, watched and actually heard them talking bad about me after I purchased a $3,000 ring. I bought my ring last Tuesday. They hurried it's sizing for me so it would be ready. That's ONE star. They told me it would be ready at 2pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 3pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 4pm. Wasn't. Then, at 5pm, I was told she left to pick up my ring, would be back in 15 minutes and I could go ahead and head up there. 30 minutes later I'm there. My ring isn't. An hour and 15 minutes later and she's not back with my ring. An hour and a half later, she's there with my ring. Isn't nice. Isn't happy. Isn't smiling. This is the MANAGER. She hands me my rings, doesn't ask if they fit ok, doesn't ask if I like them, doesn't ask if that would complete my purchase or if I need anything. Throws it in a box, hands it to me without saying a word and walks away! They talked bad about me because I'm already under the pressure of my wedding, getting my rings on time and I'm mad because they've told me lies all day long! Of course I'm going to be upset! I was lied to several times! What sucks for them?? I was preparing to buy a bracelet and a pair of earrings but instead, I walked out. When we got home we closed our credit account with them. TWO stars because my rings are absolutely beautiful. But, I will never go there again! She was sooo nice when she was selling me the rings but after she got her commission, she no longer cared if she upset me or not. She's the manager, yet her and her two employees sat there and talked about me while all three staring at me! So, two stars. For my beautiful rings and them helping me get my rings on time. What really sucks is I already left her a great review from when she wanted my money and sold me the rings. I'd love to speak to someone higher up, but they all seem to believe their employees, even if there are cameras. BTW, when I left, I went to Kay's and bought my earrings and bracelets from them! I was treated wonderfully there and would definitely recommend them! Not Zales.

name: Isaac Redding
text: Came to the store and found the ring my fiance wanted, ordered it and when it came in it was a 7 instead of a 6. They told me they could resize it but I wanted to pop the question, so, I told them I'd bring it back after the proposal. I ask her and she said yes but noticed, the chocolate diamonds that were supposed to be there were regular white diamonds. So, we dropped it off and now it's been two months and they won't give us the ring back and won't refund the ring. Beware of this place, read the other reviews they are scam artists that are trying to find behind a corporate name.

name: Charity Walker
text: I'm so disappointed and aggravated. Sent in my engagement ring to be sized BEFORE THANKSGIVING. I called multiple times after 3 weeks because they said that's about how long it would take. I called the Monday before  Christmas and they said it was shipping still.. Since then I've called daily with no one answering my calls. Someone finally answered today and said it was still shipping but then called my fiance back and said it is here.. when i arrived at the store and tried it on its STILL too loose. Oh and the lady said its been done since 12/10. No one bothered to call us. Horrible experience and ill have to get it resized again, but I'm going to go somewhere else for that now.

name: zoey bryant
text: My boyfriend got me an engagement ring and planned a trip to propose to me. He let them know his plans and what date we were going out of town. The sales team promised and assured him it would be back in time for his planned trip. It was not

name: Madeline Hawkins-Standley
text: This is a review on Signet Jewelers, the company that owns Zales, Kay, and Jarred. This Zales location is where my husband, the man in uniform in the picture below, bought my wedding ring (#19868058) on October 2017. When first purchased from Zales, the ring had a morganite stone, which was beautiful, but I had my heart set on aquamarine. We also purchased the lifetime warranty on the ring, and later another warranty just on the aquamarine stone I picked out. To make a long story short (for character count) during our time at Zales we were lied to, given false information, struggled getting in touch with the store as well as returned calls, and were pressured to purchase an aquamarine stone at a price much higher than previously discussed. Overall, my husband and I were very displeased with the service we received at Zales. Anyway, after a painstaking process, I finally got my ring back around December-January with the new aquamarine stone. Being fed up with Zales, my husband and I decided to go to Kay to have our wedding bands made. We went the same day I got my ring back from Zales to begin the process of ordering our wedding bands through Kay. His wedding band was relatively simple and took only about a month or 2 until we were able to pick it up, however, mine had to be custom made to fit the oval of my wedding ring. I picked the french beaded design Kay had for my wedding band to be made and they put all the information into the computer system. Kay assured us the bands would be ready in time for our wedding and that they would give us a call when I was able to pick my engagement ring up and to review and approve a molding of my wedding band. About 2 months went by and we hadn't heard anything, but I needed my ring for our engagement party. I had it for about a week and was told Kay needed it back to make the wedding band. Finally at about April or May we received the call that I was able to pick up my engagement ring, but never had a molding to look at and approve. In late May, about 2 weeks before we were getting married, Kay called and said my wedding band was ready. Upon seeing my wedding band that we had waited 4-5 months for the first time, I burst out crying uncontrollably and couldn't even speak to the lady. They had made the band in the wrong design. I was told that I either had to use that band to be married with and then we could start the process all over again after our honeymoon or that I wouldn't have anything to be married with. After several discussions with corporate, we were able to get our money back in full for my wedding band. I felt so defeated... I only had my engagement ring about 2 months out of our 9 month engagement period and I had no wedding band to be married with. Luckily, we found a local, family owned store that was able to make my wedding band in 2 weeks. Lou's in fact overdid themselves and made my wedding band OVERNIGHT! I saw the molding one day and was able to pick up my wedding set the next day! They saved us. But back to my aquamarine wedding ring. On the 5th day of our cruise I lost my stone. As you can see in the pictures below, the prong completely broke off and the stone fell out. I searched the ship for 4 hours, sobbing the entire time and finally a little girl found the stone at the bottom of the pool! We took the ring back to Zales as soon as we got back to port and they soldered a new prong on in about 2 weeks or so. Not even a month later when we were in Savannah for my birthday, I was taking my wedding set off to clean it and the band completely snapped in half (picture bellow). I took my ring to a local Zales a few days later, but not until another area on the band broke, leaving my ring in 2 pieces. Since we had the complete warranty on the ring and stone and this was the second time the ring had broken I told Zales that I wanted my aquamarine stone put into a new setting. Well now I have my ring back. No new setting, just soldered in 3 separate places. Now I'm scared just to put the ring on my finger. Why are we treated like this when we've paid so much money?

name: Nemindra Mahathalagalage
text: I went to the Zales store in Mobile AL to buy piece of jewelry and I was there for 5 minutes nobody came to greet me.  One lady was having a personal discussion with another person and laughing.  She saw me but didn't even want to say hi.  Just want to let you know went the Kay jewelers and spent 3K.  Service is horrible!  Not recommending your store to anyone.

name: Tyler Etheridge
text: I would give zero if I could. I made a purchase through Zales which was shipped by UPS. The order was lost by UPS and Zales refuses to refund my money or resend the order until UPS investigates which takes 30 days. This was a Christmas gift that won't make it before the holiday!

name: E Bee
text: great people  working who love there job

name: GeKayla Williams
text: My boyfriend and I will NEVER purchase anything else from Zales. Their team is horrible and I mean horrible when it comes to communicating with each other. A necklace that was purchased for me for Christmas was brought back to the store to get repaired in April they gave us a promise date of the next week. Since then we’ve called them four different time and has received four different dates and everyone I talk to seems to have no knowledge of what’s going on and when my necklace will be repaired and sent back to the store.

name: Jamie O'Bryant
text: Paid for a nice wedding band there. The display one was broken,  so they had to order another one.  They told us to take the broken display ring,  and "exchange" it when the new one came in.  I was not willing to be responsible for a ring that was already broken that I was not planning to keep. They finally agreed that we could pay and then pick up the ring when it came in 5 days.   Over a month later,  and several calls,  they couldn't figure out where the ring was, maybe they never ordered it.   They told us on Thursday that they'd order it and they'd call us Monday.  By Wednesday we called several times,  no answer EVER at the store during business hours.  Finally got an answer,  and they hung up on me.  We drove to the store,  waited in a huge crowd while only 3 employees tried to handle at least 20 customers (days before Christmas).  The only good thing about the experience was the person we purchased from was nice and spent time with us, and the person we requested our refund from was very understanding.  When we got there,  they did have the ring,  but we just got a refund because we don't want to deal with this location ever again.  There's plenty of other jewelers in Mobile,  even if we end up spending more money. We don't want to deal with a lifetime of repairs,  cleanings, resizings, etc through this location.  They have a nice selection and good deals,  but I'd only buy for something that is a one time thing,  like a necklace,  not something that you'll need to deal with them regularly.

text: Rude and unprofessional sent my ring off to get a diamond replaced took almost a month. Then they never called and let me know my ring was back.  And it had been back for almost a week .I wouldn't give a damn if all the diamonds fell out im not sending it back!!!

text: I have been a customer of Brock's Jewelers in Madison, AL for almost 3 decades and the service has always been excellent and PERSONABLE. There is never a hard sell approach. On the contrary, Alan or his father will spend as much time that is needed for you to feel comfortable with your purchase. The quality of their jewelry is exceptional.

resp.text: Thank you!! You are so appreciated! We look forward to helping with all of your jewelry needs.

text: Brock’s Jewelers did a beautiful job at repairing a necklace for me!! I highly recommend; great service and phenomenal work.

name: Margaret Manning
text: The ladies here are so nice! A lot of times when you walk into a nice jewelry store, people can be a little uppity. I walked in my sweats looking like a hot mess express and I was treated so nicely!! They not only resized my engagement ring perfectly, they also cleaned my great great grandmothers rosary from 1889, no charge. This is the first jewelry store I’ve been in that doesn’t make me feel bad for what I have, and they genuinely want to help!! I will definitely be back. Thank you Brock’s!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We appreciate you! You are welcome in our store ANYTIME! We look forward to helping with any of your jewelry needs!

name: Meosha Williams
text: Last year, I was looking for a last birthday gift for my husband, (very last minute) and I happened upon Brocks on my way to an appointment in the same area. When I walked in, I wasn't expecting such diligent and quick service! The salesperson asked a few questions and SHE found a solution for me! She showed me the collection of wood watches and explained the links, repair, and return policy questions that I had, boxed up my item, I paid and was out  in 15 min or so!!! I was thrilled and so was my husband! I'll be returning this week for Father’s Day. Yep, last minute strikes again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We appreciate you greatly and look forward to seeing you soon!

text: What a treat it was to visit Brock's Jewelers today! It must be Alabama's best kept secret. While I was waiting for a watch battery to be replaced, I was shown the most fantastic jewelry I've ever seen. They design most of the jewelry and the designs are exquisite!  So different from the mall stores where everything looks the same from store to store. Brock's uses VS diamonds and the highest quality workmanship and beautiful stones and the results are breathtaking, unique jewelry that can't be found anywhere else.  They treat you like royalty. Brock's is my new jewelry store. If you are looking for that special gift or a special treat for yourself, be sure to treat yourself to this wonderful store.

resp.text: It was an absolute pleasure meeting and serving you. We look forward to assisting with all your jewelry needs in the future.

Josh made sure the diamond was exactly what we wanted, provided all the necessary certifications and appraisal paperwork, and is a true professional!  If you're looking for something that is unique to YOU and designed with your ideas and pricing in mind, you need to visit Josh @ Dylan Rings!  Thank you sir - we are very happy!

resp.text: Thank you for continuing to trust me to serve your jewelry needs,  it is my pleasure!

name: Amy Hibbs
text:
Josh has created 2 custom rings for me. The first was my wedding band and I love it. The second was a huge undertaking. I lost my 3 year old son in a drowning accident, 12 years ago. I had a diamond given to me at his birth and wanted a ring made with it. He would have turned 16 this year and I wanted to remember him with a Sweet 16 Ring as his mama. We worked together to create a one of a kind antique style ring with several of my diamonds and sapphires i purchased from Josh for my son’s birthstone.
He showed me computer generated pictures of what it would look like, but it did not even compare to the final product. This ring is an artist’s masterpiece!! Josh is such a talented artist and he truly exceeded my greatest expectations for this ring! It means the world to me!
If you need a custom made ring or any jewelry whatsoever, do not look anywhere else. Josh is extremely knowledgeable and easy to work with. He will meet every single dream you have for the jewelry you want! I’ll never go anywhere else!

resp.text: We are so very honored to have played a part in your story,  and am grateful that you enjoy the ring so much.  Thank you!
